title: Hydroplane Jetski - Turbo Fast Boat Racing Game
description:
Drive the Turbo Fast ocean-going Hydroplane Jetski in this exciting ultimate boat racing game!
Playing Road Racing Games is a Fun but this Hydroplane Jetski Speed Boat Racing is a way more addictive with many powerful Boats like JetSki, hovercraft, classic, offshore, catamaran, powerboat, and hydroplane to race different Maps and Tracks For water boat race , customized boats power system, turbo fast customizable Laps and Real Physics destruction and Controls for boat racing.

• Enjoy Turbo Fast mind-blowing visuals 
• customizable JetSki , Hydroplane Boats
• Explore unique boat classes: JetSki, hovercraft, classic, offshore, catamaran,powerboat, and hydroplane
• Reach impossible Turbo Fast speeds in Boat Racing Championship
• Race for the World Cup and achieve victory for your team in Xtreme Top Boat Racing Game
• Take part in a selection of hardcore challenges
• Win Turbo Fast jetSki race!
• Different Laps and Tracks 

Race for the World Cup, reach unbelievable turbo speeds, and become one of the most popular Speedboat racers in Hydroplane Jetski - Turbo Fast Boat Racing Game!

CHOOSE THE POWERBOAT OF YOUR DREAMS
Pick and tune to perfection one of the power boats and SpeedBoats  from unique Top Boat classes: hovercraft, classic, offshore, catamaran, jetski, and hydroplane. Customize your boat by tuning its appearance and slap on some decals if you want to! Find the optimal tune for your boat with dozens of performance parts – from fuel filters to gearboxes! You can also increase your engine's power, upgrade your clutch, body, nitrous, and more – these will all have a definite impact on your boat's performance.

UNIQUE HYDROPLANE LAPS SETTINGS
Have you ever dreamed of driving the fastest ocean-going powerboats, speed boat, motorboats, Hydroplane, and jet skis in the world? Are you fed up with standard boat racing games and Road Racing Games? Then you should definitely take a look at Hydroplane Jetski - Turbo Fast Boat Racing Game! Hydroplane Jetski - Turbo Fast Boat Racing Game is setting a new standard in the boat racing genre. Enjoy perfectly designed world settings that set out a multi-faceted approach to the player experience!

TURBO FAST BOAT RACING
Take the challenge and beat the high score setting a new maximum world speed record in Boat Racing! Nothing will stop you from reaching the finish line before your opponents. Race for the World Cup and win proudly your first world title! Watch out your challengers! They can be tough nuts to crack! It's about time to prove your Boat racing skills and show what you are made of!

HOW ABOUT A JETSKI RACE?
Prove your skills and drive the fastest water scooters (as they were originally called)! Have you ever dreamed about racing on a brand-new jetski and Hydroplane against real opponents? And as the wind rushes past you and little droplets of water fill the air, you'll feel the high-octane speed in your hair! Jump on a jetski and experience the most amazing water Boat Racing out there!

STUNNING GRAPHICS
Hydroplane Jetski - Turbo Fast Boat Racing Game combines extreme mind-blowing visuals and sound with breathtaking gameplay. Experience top notch graphics with realistic world settings and amazingly detailed ocean-going rides on powerboats and motorboats. We also know you'll enjoy the game because of its exotic style and vibrant world, which we all need in those long, dark winter months!

It's about time to get on your offshore powerboat, motorboat, Hydroplane or jet ski and show what you're made of! Your skills will be tested, so get ready for the most intense Boat racing game of 2018!

Download and play for amazing stunt boat racing emotions and start new season 2018 . of water Racing championship!

Finally available on Google Play for FREE!
JOIN THE BOAT RACING EXPERIENCE IN Water Island! Download NOW Hydroplane Jetski - Turbo Fast Boat Racing Game!

Race for the World Cup, reach unbelievable turbo speeds, and become one of the most popular Speedboat racers in Hydroplane Jetski - Turbo Fast Boat Racing Game!

CHOOSE THE POWERBOAT OF YOUR DREAMS
Pick and tune to perfection one of the power boats and SpeedBoats from unique Top Boat classes: hovercraft, classic, offshore, catamaran, jetski, and hydroplane. Customize your boat by tuning its appearance and slap on some decals if you want to! Find the optimal tune for your boat with dozens of performance parts – from fuel filters to gearboxes! You can also increase your engine's power, upgrade your clutch, body, nitrous, and more – these will all have a definite impact on your boat's performance.

UNIQUE HYDROPLANE LAPS SETTINGS
Have you ever dreamed of driving the fastest ocean-going powerboats, speed boat, motorboats, Hydroplane, and jet skis in the world? Are you fed up with standard boat racing games and Road Racing Games? Then you should definitely take a look at Hydroplane Jetski - Turbo Fast Boat Racing Game! Hydroplane Jetski - Turbo Fast Boat Racing Game is setting a new standard in the boat racing genre. Enjoy perfectly designed world settings that set out a multi-faceted approach to the player experience!

TURBO FAST BOAT RACING
Take the challenge and beat the high score setting a new maximum world speed record in Boat Racing! Nothing will stop you from reaching the finish line before your opponents. Race for the World Cup and win proudly your first world title! Watch out your challengers! They can be tough nuts to crack! It's about time to prove your Boat racing skills and show what you are made of!

HOW ABOUT A JETSKI RACE?
Prove your skills and drive the fastest water scooters (as they were originally called)! Have you ever dreamed about racing on a brand-new jetski and Hydroplane against real opponents? And as the wind rushes past you and little droplets of water fill the air, you'll feel the high-octane speed in your hair! Jump on a jetski and experience the most amazing water Boat Racing out there!

STUNNING GRAPHICS
Hydroplane Jetski - Turbo Fast Boat Racing Game combines extreme mind-blowing visuals and sound with breathtaking gameplay. Experience top notch graphics with realistic world settings and amazingly detailed ocean-going rides on powerboats and motorboats. We also know you'll enjoy the game because of its exotic style and vibrant world, which we all need in those long, dark winter months!

It's about time to get on your offshore powerboat, motorboat, Hydroplane or jet ski and show what you're made of! Your skills will be tested, so get ready for the most intense Boat racing game of 2018!

Download and play for amazing stunt boat racing emotions and start new season 2018 . of water Racing championship!

Finally available on Google Play for FREE!
JOIN THE BOAT RACING EXPERIENCE IN Water Island! Download NOW Hydroplane Jetski - Turbo Fast Boat Racing Game!

title: 4x4 Dirt Racing - Offroad Dunes Rally Car Race 3D
description:
4x4 Dirt Racing - Offroad Dunes Rally Car Race 3D takes F2P racing to a whole new level. Go further than where the roads can take you - race to the wilderness, the dirt, the forests, and beyond!

So you have raced on the asphalt... How well will you drift on the dirt road? Take the challenge and become the best racer - this time, on different terrain! Feel the thrill of racing on grass, rocks, soil, or snow - with realistic driving physics, you will feel the difference. 

Beware, the competition is stiff. Your opponents are fast, mean, and furious 👾 - they will try to mercilessly crash on you, doing everything to stop you from finishing the race. Choose your favorite rally car, buggy or jeep, race across 50 different tracks, and enjoy next-gen graphics and realistic racing physics and driving controls. The world is your playground!

Take the challenge and drive. Reach the finish line and get the best times possible. Download 4x4 Dirt Racing - Offroad Dunes Rally Car Race 3D free from Google Play Store now!

FEATURES
🏎 Multiple deadly rally vehicles: racing cars, buggy, jeep
🏎 50 different racing tracks
🏎 Multiple ground surface properties
🏎 Realistic physics with consistent vehicle behavior
🏎 Highly optimized Next-Gen graphics and sounds 

What are you waiting for? DOWNLOAD 4x4 Dirt Racing - Offroad Dunes Rally Car Race 3D free from the Google Play Store NOW!

A WILD EXPERIENCE
No roads here - only the signs will tell you where to go. Choose between many different offroad rides, all realistically rendered. Drive your car faster than your opponents while going through all the checkpoints to win this exciting open-world race!

THE WORLD IS YOUR STAGE
Take your cars through beautifully drawn environments such as sand dunes, forests, grasslands, and more. Can you emerge as the champion through all 50 stages? It's all up to you now. Go and race your heart out!

A RALLY RACE LIKE NEVER BEFORE
The different stages will also have various track properties. The rocks, the soil, the sand, the grass, the snow... They will all provide a different driving feel. Get a proper feel for all of them and make the competition eat your dust!

REAL TOUGH COMPETITION
The opponents you will race are mean monsters 👾, ready to take you out of the race through different means. Their monster trucks will try their hardest to beat you up - all to take the victory for themselves. Beat them in their own game, or simply try to drift and outrace them all... It's all up to you. 

This game is the closest you can get to real rally racing. Feel as if you are driving on a real buggy or jeep! Download 4x4 Dirt Racing - Offroad Dunes Rally Car Race 3D free from Google Play Store and make your competitors eat your dust..

description:
Bmx Stunts Racer Reckless Rider
Let’s Play the best bmx bicycle racing game in the town and kill the boring time via enjoyable stunts racing game. Go to the garage and choose your favorite BMX bikes and zap through the mean streets. Avoid different obstacles, you would face a lot of obstacles and hurdles. Likewise in car stunts racing game you as a stunts driver drive your car to climb hills with most realistic control to face the challenges of unique uphill racing and downhill environments, you are going to ride on your happy bicycle on wheels and will do perform gt stunts on the epic bmx stunts race on stunning stunts tracks. This is a perfect biker racing adventure game for those who are searching for challenging motorbike stunt games but not happy with that then you have to try this bicycle racing game for once. Ride world fastest sports bicycles, take parts in bike cycle racing 2018 where all the pro BMX pro rider take part and try to beat others professional cycle riders.

Bmx Stunts Racer Reckless Rider is giving you the chance to become the stunts champion on impossible tracks now you are the last time champion of Hill Cycle Riding Championship, but this cycle traffic racing is very hard to complete. Cycle Racing 2017 this game have 6 fastest bicycle in bicycle garage for ours valuable users to amuse them. Become a BMX rider and enjoy the likes of right BMX or finger BMX, BMX Stunts Racer 2017. This race has no fuel and gas restriction but the time is limited to collect check points in the racing arena so paddle fast with your amazing BMX cycle as fast as possible and reach at checkpoints to win the cycle race.
If you are stunts lover then this game is for you as you are fearless stunts rider and can perform tricky bike stunts in the air become the Skater Boy In this BMX game and try escaping Pumped bmx is ready for stunts in VMX races. in this vmx racing game you have to Hop on to your BMX bike and race till you reach the finish line. Do not pause anywhere on your track or you may lose the racing track. You’ll feel the skater adventures and extreme stunts in this cycling game trying to escape like a rabbit from this situation. Prove yourself to be the best among best in the world of BMX stunts dash.
A scooter BMX freestyle game you might have played and you must have given try for the touch-grind skate game of other different types of stunts game but you have to play this Bmx Stunts Racer Reckless Rider to have the real fun of happy cycling.

Different levels and stunts design in this game Nitro use the final position in the given time. You will falling down many time in racing to perform cycle stunts like in stunt racer of bike stunts, but you have to get up start your cycle bike paddling, refill your energy like refueled to perform crazy stunts.


Features: 
- 6 beautiful realistic bicycles 
- 3rd Person Cycling 
- Realistic Cycle
- Street Cycle Racing

- Nitro For Push Up 
- Exciting Freestyle BMX Added with Impossible Levels
- Real street racer game.
- Detailed environments.
- Do wheelies and BMX stunts 
- Spend your cash for unlocking new bikes.
- Smooth controls.
- Use turbo boosts to go very fast.
- BMX freestyle passion racing in bicycle racing 2018
- Extreme riding to accelerate with paddle the BMX cycle 

So, let’s become the bicycle rider and download this Bmx Stunts Racer Reckless Rider and jump into freestyle quad bmx bicycle racing game and satisfy our passion for cycle racing game with world best bicycle racers. When you will win you can unlock new bicycle models in extreme bicycle racing with mountain bicycles perform like hill stunts or crazy bicycle stunts game. So enjoy the best bmx stunts race reckless racing game with amazing 3D Graphics and real bicycle racing game simulation.

title: Mountain King Offroad
description:
Are you ready to challenge the mountains?

Race against time in challenging seasonal conditions and muddy roads. Enjoy the unique beauty of nature. Do not let the storms and the rocks keep you from the road! Discover from one end to the other with offroad vehicles with powerful engines! Watch your gasoline! Remember! Powerful engines consume gasoline like water. Find the gas canisters hidden for you and go on. Take a look at the terrain vehicles covered with spectacular stickers waiting for you in your garage. Develop your own beautiful vehicles and try your strength in the field! Test the suspension system with many different techniques!

Game Features;

-6 stately offroad vehicle,
-Advanced controls and realistic physics engine,
-A large garage where you can care for your car,
-A gigantic track consisting of breathtaking landscapes, realistic graphics,
-Test system for suspension maneuvers that the vehicle will enter under severe conditions,
-Residual and free-ride mode.

It's time to full tank!

title: OneWay Moto Rider
description:
OneWay Moto Rider is a thrilling, dynamic motorcycle racing game that brings you the world's most compelling and satisfying traffic escape experience!

Ride your motorbike on endless busy roads and highways and watch out for oncoming vehicles to survive for the longest time. It's about time to test your skills: dodge vehicles with blazing speed, overtake traffic in challenging missions, and narrowly avoiding collisions! Compete with professional racers. Take a variety of scenes and enjoy this real motorcycle driving experience!

High speed OneWay Moto Rider brings to you one of the most exciting traffic moto racing experience in the world! Control your moto with incredible fast speed during traffic rush time! Have fun to dodging cars and trucks while you speed up to the limit. Dodge traffic, increase your speed and score in this fast motorcycle racing challenge. Drive full speed as a furious racer from a real cockpit!
 
OneWay Moto Rider Features:
- Real moto racing life in traffic
- Realistic environmental effects
- HD 3D graphics
- Simple mode of operation
- Endless speed motorbike fun
- Realistic motorbike driving

Go Kart Racing Studios is committed to provide you with exciting entertainment which makes blood quickly rush through your veins and cat noir go kart adventure official 2018 is just providing to be the perfect sample as it offer you a surprise-filled world of off-road kart racing mayhem. New improved features that will guarantee you keep your eyes on the wheel. Dash lady bug and cat noir in its own adventures with our crash racing games!
Race against a field of evils like hawk moth and akumas. Each with unique personalities and special abilities. One kart racing studios original buggy kart racing was born with legendary cat noir in love city of Paris. As a matter of fact, buggy go kart along with adrien are not to be scared of any super villain despite all evil on car racing streets Miraculous Kart Racing adventure went rush to evil subway streets to beat of super villains. title: Police Car Gangster Chase - Robber Race Escape 🚔
description:
Police Car Gangster Chase - Robber Race Escape 🚔

Get ready for new Vegas Criminal mafia escape mission vs Police car chase in the Vegas city. Police car game is very dangerous off road car metropolis and jeep driving. You will can enjoy all driving. Your duty do not end just capturing that gangsters mafia rather you have to transfer them to police station. This is not an easy job to perform and you have to play with multiple dangers while performing these duties. But, as a good police commandos officer you have to do this with extreme care and responsibility. You are main source of SWAT police force to solve this criminal case. You have to drive police car and race through narrow streets of city while this wild crime chase car against the gods gangsters mafia. You can take this as a police vs car thief mafia car simulator game. You have to hit and smash criminals’ car with your police car games and truck. Experience the best collective package of police chase games the thief and in car racing cop chase simulator games with an amazing car driving simulator on highway-Getaway chase.

Jump in the robber car and race as fast as you can to escape the cops in this survival simulator game! Start racing now in this robbers vs cops extreme police escape!Cops would do anything to not let you escape and put you in jail like a mafia gangster driver from San Andreas crime city. You are a fearless gangsta bad boy car racer, a convict and a lawbreaker so you know what your criminal mission is! Win this police car escape challenge driving your robber car and arrive to the gangsta’s paradise to have an intense and exciting life like a real jail breaker of the mafia! The cops on gangstar car patrol are looking for the missing withdrawal from the bank robbery and want to make you bad boy robber prisoner and take you to the city of San Andreas to imprison you! Dodge fast the obstacles and escape from justice in this endless and furious gangster robber car race escape simulator! They will never chase you in this race, bad boy! You can crash the cop cars and the police car with your robber car to the side to send them right into the wall in this funny chase race! Have tons of fun in the jail break gangsta persecution with cars and gangstar car against the greedy officer and his friends in the police car, escape from the robbery chase and show off your bad boy mafia racing car that will help you to evade them and win this funny racing cops vs robbers simulator!

This gangsta city pixel robber simulator game is suitable for lawbreaker gangster car racer fans and police vs robbers game lovers. You can choose between 30 different robbery car and gangstar car types and start the robber race jail break cop escape. Prove your gangster and police car driving skills to see how long you can survive in the car racer bank police escape! Drive ahead your car among the mob of this San Andreas driving race simulator! In these mafia bad boy robber race escape games, the more you ride, the more you want to survive in the mafia battle of the gangster town! And it gets more difficult with the police car and cop car patrolling the blocky roads of this pixel car racer fight! Drive for speed with your robber car or racing car after the bank robbery in this gangster chase! Become the mafia legend of the San Andreas auto survival craft! Collect coins during your bank robbery jail break escape race challenge to increase your money in the bank of the robbing gangs! Grab power-ups for robbers on your bank escape chase to become invincible against the police gangstar car and cars in your race escape mission simulator!

Features of our police vs robbers chase game:

★ Amazing gangstar and racer driving experience!
★ High speed bad boy burglar car vs police sprinter chase!
★ Great police vs mafia lawbreaker gangsta robbers race sensation!

Dodge the police cars and gangster car in this gangsta jail break and become the best robber in town in our mafia gangster simulator!

title: Vessel Run: a race inside the body
description:
Vessel Run is the first ever game where your lifestyle will define level difficulty of the game! Enter the human body and drive your way through the dangers of the microscopic world in the most epic run! Jump in and discover the hidden threats our bodies go through daily in this sci-fi adventure! Do you accept the challenge?

Vessel Run features:
•	Random mode or Personalized mode (with 128 different game combinations)
•	3 different characters and ships, and more to come!
•	Many upgrades to improve your ships!
•	5 different kind of obstacles; push your skills to dodge them!
•	6 power-ups and collectibles
•	Simple and very responsive controls 
•	Explore the most amazing location ever!
•	Amazing visual effects 
•	Scientifically accurate, learn about biology and the human body while playing!
•	Endless fun!
•	Supported languages: English, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Chinese, Korean, Japanese
•	More ships and many other features will be added soon!

This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.

We are always striving to provide the best user experience for our players. If you experience any problem with Vessel Run, please contact our customer support team at vesselrun@gmail.com. Don't forget to specify which device and operating system you are using.

title: City Speed Racing Racer
description:
City Speed Racing Racer 2018 is the most realistic 3D drift racing simulation on mobile devices, and yet easy to control and fun to play thanks to an innovative drift helper.
Get ready to drive high performance cars (turbo or naturally aspirated) and make them drift at high speed in tracks designed specifically for drift racing.
Improve your racing and drifting skills and earn virtual money to tune and customize your car.
City Speed Racing Racer 2018 is designed to battle the world record of the leader board or just for fun in the free ride mode.
Various super cars made by top manufacturers of the world. Select your sports car, paint on your favorite color, pack up all your Nitro, chase on the road with your opponents. Crash! Drift! Roll! Gallop! Overtake! Challenge the players from all over the world. Be the top racing driver. Crazy for high Speed people will have unparalleled racing experience.
FEATURES
new drift racing tracks;
new powerful cars with specific and realistic setup;
New challenging career mode with 34 championships with growing difficulty;
All tuning options unlocked.

BUILD YOUR CAR EMPIRE IN THE FAN ZONE
From Ferris Wheels and Blimps to Hot Dog Carts and Fuel Stations, you can customize your Fan Zone with 35+ buildings and decorations. Whether its cutting down installation time in the garage, reducing R&D costs, or earning in-game currency, each building has a special reward as you embark to make history on the track.
20 + ALL- FURIOUS CARS
Think you have the skills to handle legendary cars from the Fast franchise? Compete with infamous classics from Doms Charger R/T to Lettys C2 Corvette .

Atv Cruise Bike Racing, you will become the driver of a very powerful ATV. Hop onto your ATV and try to safely drive up and over the hills towards the finish line. You can collect coins along the way too in this exciting racing game. Avoid bombs, spikes and other deadly objects on your way to the end of each level. Race uphill and downhill until you successfully pass all 12 challenges and unlock all 6 achievements.

title: Stunt Car
description:
Stunt Car is an all new cars stunting game where the main objective is to reach the finish point of the track with your vehicle intact and to perform the stunts on the way. If you miss any one of the stunts or get too much damage, then you will lose this race and will have to start the track all over again! Perform high jumps on colossal ramps; accelerate through fiery hoops; jimmy through deadly propellers; knock down and smash all types of obstacles. Jump into your muscle car, drive safely on curvy and dangerous insane tracks. Dash and race on the track at lightning fast speed displaying cool tricks! Race to reach the check point before the time runs out through metallic ramps to become the king. Be careful while racing the cars to avoid falling to the ground. Accurate physics engine that can deliver the most racing fun possible. Tighten your seat belt and enjoy loads of stunts while climbing massive heights! But avoid dangerous obstacles or you’re toast! 

Stunt Car Game Features:
- Authentic vehicle physics and flawless drive controls
- Detailed 3D graphics with amazing sounds
- Various simulation for offroad enthusiasts
- Engaging Modern Challenges with tricky tracks and obstacles
- Realistic acceleration and speed controls
- Richly detailed upgrade models
- Fun quest style missions
- Extremely Precise Driving Simulator

title: Offroad Driving Simulator 4x4: Trucks & SUV Trophy
description:
Go for extreme offroad drive, desert, forests, mud road and snowy wastes are waiting for a good offroad SUV driver! Try our new 4x4 offroad driving simulator - a cool offroad driver game with hill climb driving, lots of cool 4x4 and 6x6 trucks and tons of offroad game fun!

🗺️> Go on an epic offroad trip across FOUR REGIONS

🚘> Drive DOZENS of various TRUCKS and SUVs

🛠️> Purchase VISIBLE UPGRADES to improve your driving

⚙️> Use WINCH, DIFF LOCK and other special mechanisms

> Complete special MISSIONS and CHALLENGES for rewards

Offroad championship!
Global offroad driving contest is about to begin! Prove that your are the best at offroad driving across four regions with different conditions and trials on trucks of three various types. Prepare your self for a lot of extreme challenge - start your engine and go offroad!

Powerful 4x4 cars!
Get behind the wheel of all sorts of offroad vehicles of various types and classes, from a regular 4x4 SUV to gigantic monster-truck. Each is equipped with special offroad driving devices, like winch, and can be visibly upgraded for better performance. Use all you have to get and edge in driving!

Driving challenge!
Face various challenges of the extreme offroad - cross rivers and snowy forests, climb up hill and crawl over rocks. And complete various additional challenges and mission to get cool rewards. Make your own way to the title of the champion!

Take part in Pathfinder trials - the most extreme offroad driving tournament ever!

title: Dragon Z Super Kart
description:
Dragon Z Super Kart is a fan made Dragons-Balls game, based on the idea of kart racing with super powers!
You choose between 5 different gameplay modes: Races, Tournament, Team Mode (Olympic), Team Mode (Survival) or Online Mode. In fact, you may need to win the tournament so you can complete races tasks more easily (but not that easy).
Races (Levels)
There are more than 160 challenging levels with so many different tasks, such as finishing first, finishing before the time is out, one to one race, eliminating opponents, … and each level is unique. Levels are designed to be challenging, contains traps, boosts (of speed and protection), power ups… Levels difficulty is progressive.
Complete tasks in the current level to unlock the next one. You may use some help (more chances, skip level…) in exchange of Zenies.
Tournament
For the tournament, you play unsaved and difficult races, by winning these races; you will have a new dragon balls (a ball for each race). You can use those dragons balls to perform Super Saiyan transformations of Goku and Vegeta. Use the 7th ball of the dragon to purchase new characters. By winning the tournament, you will get rewarded with a huge amount of Zenies (which are really hard to collect), you can use them to buy power ups, purchase characters, skipping levels, getting more chances when falling…
You will be rewarded every day, and also as long as you play, so keep playing ;) . Check Daily Tasks to know how to get more Zenies.
Characters
You have a bunch of different super powerful characters such as Goku Ultra Instinct, Jiren, Toppo, Beerus, Golden Frieza, Kid Buu, Vegeta, Goku Super Saiyan God, Vegeta Super Saiyan Blue, Goku Super Saiyan Blue, ...
Saiyan characters can perform Super Saiyan transformations while playing, using the balls of dragon that you collected by winning tournament races. 
Each character has his specifics in term of speed, jump, defense, instant transmission, transformations,...
You can unlock super powerful saiyan characters by defeating them in a one to one race for 3 rounds in a row. Some characters need an amount of Zenies to unlock them.
Power Ups
-	Nimbus: use Goku’s Nimbus to fly to the first position fast and without any obstructions. You may use it also when falling and BEFORE hitting the bottom (so you can get a new chance).
-	Protector: gives you a full protection from opponents’ powers and from spikes and traps. It will also fill your super power quickly.
-	I.T: Perform Instant Transmission. You may use it also when falling and before hitting the bottom to get a new chance.
-	Speed Up: boost your speed to double.
-	Spike: set traps for your opponents.
-	Super Jump: double your jump height.

Backup & Restore
The game supports data backup and restore, so don’t worry about your saves and accomplishments ;)
Features
-	Super powerful DBS characters.
-	More than 160 challenging levels
-	The most powerful Super Saiyan characters
-	Super Saiyan transformations
-	Special Super Powers for each character
-	Online mode
-	Power Ups to help you win the race and defeat your opponents
-	More help in skipping levels and getting more chances
-	Enthusiastic music & sfx
-	Unique and easy gameplay

Tips
* To get more Zenies:
- Re-win the easy levels
- Win the tournament
- Complete Daily Tasks

Check the game facebook page to get free coupons (Zenies, unlock characters, skip levels, ...)
https://www.facebook.com/DragonZSuperKart



DISCLAIMER
Please note that this is a fan made game inspired from the manga dragonball, used only for entertainment. All copyrights and credits of the manga remains to their lawful owners, we DO NOT want any infringement of rights in any way.

Have Fun!

description:

Road Drift Car Racing Games simulator
- Road Drift Car Racing Games gives you a unique experience in the handling of sport cars by the simple and the intuitive way 
- If you like to drift, get ready to spend many hours playing this game 
- Use separate handbrake button to start drifting
- Paint donuts burning tires 
- Animation of the deep smoke while drifting 

THE MOST REALISTIC MOBILE RACING GAME
- Insane feeling of powerful sport cars 
- Unique driving on different surfaces - asphalt, grass, sand,snow 
- Racing on high detailed tracks 
- You can customize your handling scheme 
- You can select different setups for every car - Stock, Turbo, Racing, Drift
- You can change color of your car and discs and cars

- Share your scores

title: Mad Pixels New Moon
description:
Welcome to Mad Pixels New Moon, a dynamic 3d action from a third party, racing on beautiful fast cars, a shooter that plunges headlong into your storyline and a big open world.

Features of Mad Pixels New Moon

SIMULATOR IN THE BIG CITY
A big open world, a third-person sandbox in which you can do absolutely anything! To steal cars, buy the best weapons and do everything available to become the most important gangster in the city. In the game there is a change of day and night, at any time you can live peacefully, or create chaos. But, of course, one does not interfere with one another! Start a gang and survive the city that

GAMEPLAY AND OPTIMIZATION
Interesting gameplay, which diversified the genre of adventure. Where else will you see a shooter, a simulator, a race, and an RPG system? It's all in one!
The game is optimized for all devices! Game for the Chinese phone!

SHOOTER FROM THE THIRD PARTY WITH THE ELEMENTS OF THE SHUTTER, POGONI AND RACES, WHICH YOU WILL NOT OPPOSE OF
Shooting with absolute freedom of action. Today you are kind civil, and tomorrow you will capture all the streets of this city! In your inventory can fit more than twenty guns, which are waiting, when you buy them all!
The most unusual cars, 20 brands that you have never seen before, but it's a pleasure to ride! Speed, drive, never drive alone!

A GREAT WORLD WITH BEAUTIFUL HD GRAPHICS
Colorful stylized pixel world with an unusual graphic concept of low poly and voxel graphics.

Also you can play it without the Internet and wi-fi

The plot of the game:
Connor is an excellent Pixeland police officer, he loves his work, honors the law, and going on a job is always laid out in full. Connor distinguished himself in the service of his dedication, and, of course, the successful conduct of numerous operations to detain criminals. Once, after a successful round-up, the police finally detain the dangerous gangster Marcus.
Connor is instructed to guard the main witness in the case of the gangster's secretary. However, on the day of the scheduled hearing, the girl mysteriously disappears. But this is not the worst thing, the police suspect Connor of being involved in the mafia and their dirty deeds. To relieve himself of suspicion, the policeman must find the missing girl and put Marcus behind bars.

P.S .: Thank you, dear users, for your comments and wishes. For us it is very important! We do everything to make you enjoy and enjoy the game.
Daily news search on our website in 
https://www.facebook.com/zulugame
and in our group VK https://vk.com/zulueg
and also follow the news on the site https://www.instagram.com/zulu_extreme_games/

title: Bike Stunts - Extreme
description:
In Bike Stunts Extreme Rider, you can get the feel of being the supreme bikes racer. Use the games fine controls to successfully 

complete the impossible tracks without crashing and falling off the track. Use the motorcycle driving tricks and dangerous challenges 

and make all achievements of this bikes stunt game. The gameplay carries multiple controls, Acceleration, breaks, Forward, Backward, 

Jumps. Each level is more challenging and thrilling than the other level. It is time for exciting ride and crazy stunt. 

Steer your motorbikes through bizarre routes and dodge treacherous obstacles. Leap over fiery rooftops of this cool fantasy city!  Here 

is the chance to step up and prove that you are the most intense and competitive biker. Your goal in the game, successfully complete 

several levels, consisting of challenging and dangerous track and jumps. Realistic and eye-catching graphics to will provide you with 

the best motorcycle experience. There are massive jumping boards, mid­-air ramps, a variety of motor paths and stints! City highways 

are no match for the insane speed. Experience the thrilling adventure now! 

Bike Stunts Extreme Rider Game Features :

1. Smooth and realistic motorbike handling
2. Stunning 3D Graphics 
3. Fine motorbike control with 15 upgrades
4. Dynamic camera angles
5. Authentic 3D physics 
6. Amazing and effective visual and sound effects

Unlock new Championships and Achievements on your quest for Legendary Status.

- Race rolling waves in exotic locations
- Experience 48 challenging courses
- Perform gut-wrenching stunts
- Ride 12 high-powered watercraft

- Beat target times and unlock medals

title: Speed Car Drift Racing
description:
Speed Car Drift Racing is the best mobile racing game you have been looking for. You drive your car in cockpit view through the endless traffic and realistic environment. Tilt your device to drag your car wherever you want, overtake traffic, earn coins and buy new cars.

Speed Car Drift Racing is game racing and overtaking vehicles both in city and highway traffic, this game features 5 enjoyable modes of racing: carrier mode, infinite mode, against-time mode, free mode and a multiplayer mode. You can choose between one-way and two-way traffic and choose among three times of day periods, namely “Morning”, “Sunset” and “Night”. 

FEATURES:
- MULTIPLE CAMERA ANGLES: There are 4 camera angles. Helicopter, back, hood and cockpit. All vehicles you can opt to drive come also with high quality interiors to offer the best possible cockpit camera experience. 

- VERY SENSITIVE AND EASY CONTROLS: Racing Speed Limits has very easy and sensitive game controls for you to make great fun out of it.

- DRIVING PHYSICS: All cars in Racing Speed Limits have realistic power, torque and gear ratios. The acceleration process and top speeds are based on a complete simulation. Vehicle body weight, gear ratios, engine power and torque ratios are all taken into account.

- LOTS OF VERY HIGH DETAILED VEHICLES: Lots of vehicles with high levels of graphical detail are waiting for you to drive! The graphical details of cars present in Racing Speed Limits are the bests of its category.

- TUNINGS AND UPGRADES: You can customize your car by changing gear ratios, ride heights and wheel camber angles. You can upgrade your engine, brakes, and handling for better performance. Several body and rim colors are also available for you to choose.

- REALISTIC GRAPHICS: Racing Speed Limits features lots of optimizations on very high detail and realistic graphics.

Drift through the empty lanes to avoid crashing into traffic racing cars. Car endless chasing in real world of speed racers with top driving game features, In short its all about car racing, rush driving and dodging the in coming traffic. 

Choose from multiple cars
Car Racing Traffic Overtake has multiple cars to choose from. Earn points by drifting, wining the race and proving yourself to be the best car driver in this racing game. 

Endless World
Drive your car, dodge the traffic and beat other racers records in the endless world environment

Beat your own score
Overtake traffic cars on the road with a close call and earn points which add up in the end of the racer game to beat up old score

Realistic car physics
Press your paddle and get the taste of real car driving game while racing with speedy racer cars.

Top autos with turbo rush
Speed up your car and turn on the turbo rush feature during the race to win

Racing modes
Highway traffic racer comes with different arcade race modes endless, beat the clock, Dual and single traffic lanes

Unlock achievements 
Beat your score and drive fast to unlock achievements 

Stunning 3D graphics
All cars and environment models are beautifully designed

title: Car Formula Racing: F1 2018
description:
Formula one also is known as top speed Formula Racing: F1 2018 or F1 and furious Formula 1car is the fastest car drift auto racing sanctioned FIA owned by the British government drift car formula: drift racing one group. FIA formula one world championship is the premier forms of racing into the whole world. You might play multiple formula furious car games but I am sure you never played such an amazing formula 1 racing car games. Formula 1 car racing 3d games free are famous all over the world especially in India and European countries.  People from India become the fan of real formula racing F1 track but they may not drive formula one car in their real life, our team introduces the real formula driving game. F1 2018 games are famous in all over the world. Play this real formula 1 road car parking adventure race or F1 championship race on the racing tracks. This F1 2018 is like a driving school game. Initial levels of car racing games are too easy and for the training of legend driver. Furious formula 1 car games are too fast and only daring drivers can drive this real racing game.
Car formula 1 or top speed car parking with this sports car gives you another joyful journey on the asphalt roads with top speed car. In the start parking adventure race f1 championship, fasten your seat belt and put your hands on the steering wheel, start heavy duty muscle car engine. You will race and also face parking adventure. This need for racing fever much better than racing fever games. Car formula driving zone is within the mountains or in other words you can say on impossible roads. If you are a daring driver then you have to show your furious racing skills in fast speed championship. Formula 1 racing having different environments such as desert, uphill and other stony roads.
Opened wheel racing car game has different modes such as within the city, jungle roads and on the hill climb mountain roads. It’s the single seated motor racing game. Realistic graphics with the high definition environment. Play this formula car racing to defeat the other formula drift racing games.

Top speed Formula Racing: F1 2018 Features:
•	Multiple drift racing cars with the different drivers legend
•	Multiple controls with the steering wheel, and tilt controls
•	Best racing driver from all over the world
•	World best formula cars

title: Pizza Delivery: Driving Simulator
description:
New and exciting pizza delivery driving game! Multiple game modes, varied challenges and exciting races around beautiful city environments! Become a pizza delivery driver & more!

FEATURES:
▶ 5 UNIQUE GAME MODES: Discover and master driving in all of them!
▶ EXCITING CITY ENVIRONMENTS: Full of challenging narrow passages
▶ REALISTIC TRAFFIC AND PEDESTRIANS: Be careful while you drive!
▶ AWESOME COLLECTION OF VEHICLES: Bikes, cars and more!

Your pizza delivery driver adventure begins now! Driving & parking a varied car & bike selection you will complete driving challenges, deliver pizza orders and take part in exciting night races in a beautiful city! This is the ultimate simulator experience for car driving fans who are looking for something new and different from other racing games!

In pizza delivery you will have to make sure that people around the city get what they ordered! As a pizza delivery boy, find them on the map, start driving to meet them at certain checkpoints or do a little bit of detective work when all you know about the customer’s location is the street they’re waiting on! Your trusty motorcycle will get you to your destination on time - provided you’re a good enough pizza delivery driver! Your parking skills will also be teste here - wouldn’t like those orders to arrive damaged! 

Can you drive fast enough to make the pizza delivery on time but also be safe and accurate in your parking? Prove your bike driving skills and show that you are able to do just that! If you crash - you fail. This is a realistic driving simulator in which you will have to drive safely and carefully. But there are second chances! If your motorcycle crashes, you can always use a handy time rewind feature to get back on your feet and make your pizza delivery.

In bike collection you will have to navigate the city and collect bikes left by the people who rented them. Will you be able to find your way around a busy city using only the in-game map? You will have to use your logical thinking skills and spatial awareness in your driving. Transporting expensive cargo is a demanding task that requires skillful driving and parking!

In night races you will have to prove your quick reflexes and driving skills to outrun other drivers and be the first to the finish line! Play a different kind of driving simulator! Trust in your quick reflexes and instincts to drive fast and leave your driving opponents behind!

Discover all of those activities and master them to become the ultimate pizza delivery driver and more!

title: POV Car Driving
description:
Pov Car Driving is a driving game that you will face with curved roads, endless highways, trial events with no limits. Remember this is not a simple race game, this is a kind of game like long ride driving game. But however, if you want to race with your opponents you can race with other faster cars in the traffic.

You must be aware of to traffic jams, crashed cars, speed limits, speed cameras, and many little detail in this game.

Let's check whats offering our game Pov Car Driving to fastest drivers!

» Endless curved roads

    You can experiance endless, curved and detailed highways. We are using road variant algoritm that you will always face with new kind of ways while you are driving with your car. 

» Curves

    There are many of endless racing game with only straight roads. We created curved roads for you to drive on it. Our steer helper and curved road will offering you a great car driving experiance. You will be feel like driving on a highway.
    
» Speed Radars
    While you are driving, you must be avoid of speed radars. Remember, speed cameras are invented for our driving safety. We put some speed cameras on your path for make sure your journey is in "safe". We also put some other surprises for you. Drive safe!

» Radio Channels
     What will you do if we will tell you you can listen a real internet radio while you playing your game and you can controll it on your cars radio? You can listen your favorite radio while driving with your car.

» Realistic Cabin Sounds
     This is a long ride driving game and we must be design everything realistic as we can. You will notice that you will only hear trim and turbo sounds while driving with new cars. And of course there will be wind sounds if you go faster than "normal limits". This reduce canceling car isolations will make your journey less annoying.

» Dynamic Weather
      We know you want to drive fast as you can but you always watch the weather condition for make your driving safier! With our dynamic weather change algorithm you must avoid of some serius weather conditions.

» High Detailed Cockpits
      When you start your journey with your car you will notice extra details on your car. We put almost every car details to our cockpits. When you racing with time, you will feel the driving in car atmoshpere.

 and many more awesome contents is waiting for you.


You can control your car with tilt, buttons or steering wheel. You can collect points while passing cars, you can collect diamonds and you can unlock special cars with special events!

If you are tired of clone racing games, POV Car Driving is waiting for you.

Enjoy.

Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/szinteractive

Youtube
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHiYLip3sss58oNr3pgYLLQ

title: Mental Taxi Simulator - Taxi Game
description:
Do you want to take your passengers on their craziest taxi ride ever? Then Play The brand new driving simulator - Mental Taxi Simulator - Taxi Game. Scare your customers in the most fun, hilarious, and crazy taxi rides!

Play in career mode, where you can develop your taxi driver skills and buy new Cars and Taxis, this free cab simulator lets you take a call from dispatch, and collect fares from your taxi customers no matter what. 

This is not just an average taxi game that lets you pick and drop passenger, but its the best taxi game that lets you drift,race, climb hill and surely is one of the best driving games. 

It's time to get into your taxi, start the engine and become a traffic racer to drive the city crazy. Drive your cab through the big city traffic, pick up passengers and drive them safely to their destinations. Duty driving is easy just drive as you please and you don't even need to refuel your taxi cab.

A taxi simulator should let you choose the passenger so make a decision on who to pick up. It's all upto you.

The wait is over Porsche Carrera 911 S Super Car: Speed Drifter is the best car driving game with high quality super cars models including Volkswagen Golf, Honda NSX, Aston Martin Vanquish S, Bugatti Veyron, Ferrari Berlinetta F12 TRS, Mercedes - Benz C63 which can be purchased by in game coins. Enjoy Day & Night cycle with huge open world environment and perform speed drift in city.

Enjoy the city drifting simulator with Porsche Carrera 911 S super car to improve your racing and drifting skills, earn virtual money for tuning and customizing your ultimate super car with bursting tires and flaming engines.

Porsche Carrera 911 S Super Car - City Speed Drifter Features:

- Impossible Tracks with Storm Drifting Traffic
- Offroad Curvy Tracks for high powered Cars i.e Land Cruiser
- Crazy High Speed Super Cars with Realistic Physics
- Real Model Of Porsche Carrera 911 S with Golf, Honda NSX, Aston S, Veyron, Berlinetta F12.
- All tuning options can be unlocked.
- Animation of the profound smoke while drifting
- Realistic City with lots of stunts for Car madness
- Considerable customization options to modify your own super Car
- Modify body color, rims model, rims color.
- Paint donuts burning tires and many more
- Classical Stunt and city car racing record
- Realistic Camera for Interior Car views
- Complete Drift Physics for Drifting Lovers.
- Accelerator and touch steering mode
- The Best Car Driving Simulator 2018
- Dynamic Traffic & Free mode
summary: Drive Luxury Super Car: Porsche Carrera 911 S with Real Car Drifting Physics

title: Reckless BMX Stunt Racer
description:
BMX speed stunts Rider with the real BMX and smart driving will make you the canvas rider become the expert on turbo champion nitro bike reckless racing. Avoid the bycicle breakneck because this game is like a Reckless draw BMX rider. In this scooter BMX freestyle game try for the touch: grind skate different types of stunts will face and many different obstacles also will stop you to escape. Different levels and stunts design in this game use nitro to reach the final position in the given time you can customize your BMX from selection area many different models and character textures are available for you to choose.

Become a reckless BMX rider and accomplish spectacular tricks in breathtaking places all over the world. Just like in real BMX or finger BMX, reckless BMX Stunts rider is a game of skill that takings a few actions to realize but a lifetime to master. This game is designed just for the stunts lovers in this game you will perform fearless stunts in the air upon the water. Little yellow bike Skater boy in this BMX game is a thief who is grabbing money from someone and wants to escape help him to escape. Your pumped BMX is ready for stunts in vmx racing. You will feel the skater adventures, and extreme stunts in this cycling game try to vanish like a rabbit from this situation. 

KEY FEATURES:

- BMX Billboard racing is a passion 
- Pedal your bmx for extreme riding 
- Pick the nitro for boost up 
- Use your speed as per need 
- Control your BMX for complete the level easily

title: Go Go Racing
description:
High speed arcade action in this mobile racing game! 5 cars to unlock and upgrade, a wide selection of tracks, and both a story mode and time trial mode!

Complete against 4 other cars and avoid other vehicles on the road as you race toward the finish line, or try to keep the game going as long as possible in the endless time trial!

Weapons and powerups include 3 kinds of missiles, speed boosts, shields, punching gloves (Yes, punching gloves), and more! Oh, also one that transforms you into a big mech that trashes everything in it's path.

It's awesome, trust us on this.

title: Bike Stunts 3D - Rooftop Challenge
description:
Bike Stunts is an insane stunts game which has some of the most terrifying and challenging levels to complete. With a huge selection of some of the craziest bikes, you can perform epic and high flying stunts. Become a famous stunt rider, entertain the crowds and earn their praise. Compete with your rivals and score points and earn a round of applause from the judges. Style yourself up with the best biking gear, hundreds of amazing design combinations for you to choose so that you look cool while performing stunts. Feel the rush during the air time and plan your landing smartly so that get a edge over your rivals. Some of the craziest ramps to jump across. Get ready for this thrilling adventure in the official bike stunts game.

Game Features: 
1) Challenging Levels.
2) Amazing Selection of Bikes.
3) Exclusive Biking Gear.
4) HD Graphics.
5) Smooth and Easy Game-play.

title: Car Driving and Parking Simulator
description:
Do you want to learn driving? if you want to enjoy the best car driving and car drifting experience then we present you with the city drift car game that will keep you driving on the roads if skill city. You will face multiple challenges such as time trial, driving in traffic, driving through construction zone and drive to avoid obstacles and hurdles. The mechanics of the game are very interesting where you get points for the perfect drifting and perfect run on the track. It is a great simulator for the driving lessons where you learn to do the parking and also get a great driving practice. This driving and parking game gives you an environment for driving school and the concepts of the driving academy will help you learn to drive. 

Turn the rueda and spin the roue to ensure that you try this car driving game versus other car driving games available online. This vehicle simulator will give you an opportunity to drive muscle cars, vintage cars, hatchbacks, 4x4 jeeps and heavy trucks on the streets of skill city. You will also get a change to build you dream car by assembling multiple car parts such as tyres, shocks, engines, turbos and many other. Build your car profile to make an epic car character that will take you through this great journey seamlessly. The speed drifting will give you incentive to build the game character.

Engaging gameplay and great 3D assets of multiple vehicles will provide a great user experience alongside a carefully crafted gameplay that will keep you engaged. 

Please provide your reviews for the game so that we can constantly improve and entertain you.

description:
Mobile Rally has stunning graphics, realistic car physics. Mobile Rally is your new racing experience. Control your car get the best time and beat your opponents. Totally free racing game with no in-app purchasing.

Features:

* Highly detailed car models and racing tracks. 
* 2 camera angles.
* 4 different rally cars.
* 2 Control modes. Tilt and Touch.
* Gravel, Sand, Snow 3 different ground surface to race.

description:
Get ready for the ultimate arcade racer! How long can you survive the arena? Smell the petrol fumes and enjoy the carnage!
Derby Demolition can be dangerous but it’s also the most fun to wreck into other cars! Deliberately destroy other cars in the #1 Demolition Derby game on Android now!

title: Blocky Farm Racing & Simulator
description:
Blocky Farm Racing & Simulator is a free game where you can race through village or play farm simulator mode.
Choose tractor, harvester or a car and hit the road! Check how far you can drive without crash in Race mode. In Demolition mode - smash every vehicle or object you see!
Even more fun waits for you in Farm simulator mode. Find huge map, cities, fields and cute animals! Become real blocky farmer and grow your farm! ... or just relax and start village exploration!


FARM MODE: 
- big ranch and village
- four agricultural machines to use: hay baler, trailer, watering machine and plow
- select one of three combines to start harvesting
- four tractors including backhoe
- harvest wheat and corn (fields are marked on your map)
- release seeds anywhere!
- sell your seeds and hay bales to farmer's market
- grow your Farm Score by selling more and more crops!
- unlock three unique vehicles with your Farm Score 
- garages to hide your machines
- lot of cute animals including pigs and loud chickens!
- receive Animal Lover badge by feeding cows in your ranch pen with seeds or hay bales
- drive train through entire map!
- discover hidden places like family campfires
- lot of streets and railroads

DEMOLITION MODE: 
- destroy vehicles, pigs and dangerous bulls!

RACE MODE: 
- drive and stay alive!
- unlock features by driving as far as you can
- avoid obstacles like broken tractor or car accidents


CUSTOMIZATION:
- change colors in your tractor or harvester
- take the roof down or remove combine header!
- select color of your rims
- power engine feature for Cabrio and Pickup

FEATURES
- play during the day, sunset and night mode! 
- street traffic in each game mode 
- lot of player skins to choose
- cool sounds and realistic physics
- play offline mode - no need for internet connection



Keep updated - subscribe now!
Website: www.mobadu.pl
Facebook: www.facebook.com/3Dmaze
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mobadu/

title: Super Kart Racing
description:
We are excited to announce Super Kart Racing, one of the best and fun racing games of the year 2018.

An amazing Kart Racing Game with fast racing cars and fantastic racers. And it's a totally FREE racing game.

Fast and fantastic cars and racers are waiting for you. Speed up, throw the rocket, make drift and go with nitro with Next-Gen hd graphics on the amazing racing tracks... Defeat your rivals and win the race cups.

Super Kart Racing is an exciting and amazing racing game for all ages. Beach Racing, Buggy Forest, Funny Land, Mystic Egypt, Candy Asphalt Walley... And do more exciting battles on the racing courses. Be king of the Asphalt.

Collect new racing cars and the fastest racers. Upgrade the collections. Race the rivals with 3 different difficulty levels on Grand Prix Cup mode!Complete the fun and impossible missions. Online Race coming soon on live...

Race anytime, anywhere!


• • GAME FEATURES

EXCITING KART RACING GAME
Fast, funny and FREE. Race to with hardly rivals racers in the exciting and contain actions races on fantastic courses. Show the drift skills. Come to the finish line for the cups. Be a legendary racer on race areas. Burn the Asphalt . And it's a totally FREE racing game.

AMAZING POWER-UPS
Shoot a powerful blow to the rival racers with your powers. Defeat other racers with 8 different awesome powers. Get the edge on the competition with these powerful items. Throw the rocket, do it ice cubes, put dynamite, use nitro... And more power-ups are waiting for you.

UPGRADE THE RACE CARS
Choose your favorite racing car. Paint the your car with your favorite colors. Change race tires. 25 different vehicle colors and 4 different tire types await you. Create the your racing car as you wish.

COLLECT THE AMAZING RACERS
The racers are great in this game. Collect interesting, funny, speedy and super racing characters.

RACE THE SUPERB PLACES
Race on specially designed racing tracks. Develop your fast driving skills on asphalt and soil roads. Show the your drift skills. Defeat your other racers. Be a legendary racer on racing tracks. Beach Racing, Buggy Forest, Funny Land, Mystic Egypt, Candy Asphalt Walley... And do more exciting battles on the racing tracks.

COMPLETE THE IMPOSSIBLE MISSIONS
Complete the hard and fun missions. Collect gold, Blow up balloons, Time attack, Crush your opponents... Complete missions and to be rich. Collect new racing cars and racers.

PLAY WITH NEXT-GEN HD GRAPHICS
Experience a gorgeous and fun kart race game experience with high quality graphics.

SENSITIVE RACE CAR PHYSIC
Make the perfect drift with to sensitive car physic.

ONLINE RACE
Race with real racers in real racing games. Very soon...

title: D IS FOR DRIFT
description:
A pure arcade-style drifting experience! Customize your ride, enter an event, and shred some tires! D IS FOR DRIFT is the official game of the B IS FOR BUILD YouTube series!

• Drift legendary cars including favorites from the show
• Personalize your vehicle with custom paint, wheels, hoods, and spoilers 
• Earn medals in 30 events at 5 beautiful locations
• Formula Drift inspired judging measures your angle, speed, line and style in each run
• Challenge friends and unlock new achievements

title: Hill Climb Racing Legend: Superhero Lightning Car
description:
Get ready to be amazed and mark your name as a true extreme hill climb and racing and stunts legend as we bring you this extreme lightning car driving simulator which is going to give you real racing and crazy car driving experience and will select you as a new fast car king of hill racing. If you are up for real car race challenge then get this super exciting and amazing lightning car racing game which is going to satisfy your car drift needs along with uphill racing and car hill climb. Become a successful mountain climber in your superhero car and complete your mountain hike at lightning speed. Out of all car racing games, drift racing games and driving games this superhero lightning car hill climb and racing legend is the most realistic offroad racing car amazing game in the market.

 Superhero lightning car hill climb legend is a realistic simulation and extreme climb top adventure game in which you need to collect coins by overcoming the obstacles using your superhero powers. There are multiple lightning speed fast cars available for mountain climbers along with their superhero drivers. You can drive any unlocked lightning car or you can buy high performance cars for more fun. 

Prepare yourself to be amazed as this racing hill cargames features tense and super cool environment, cracked mountain tracks, different barriers and obstacles, sky high mountain peaks, impossible mid-air ramps, straight and curvy narrow passages for stunt and car race challenges, wooden bridges and awesome skyboxes. Coins are placed on various places . Collect them to upgrade your lightning speed car and climb top in top gear in this racing challenge 2018. 

The gameplay of this car race challenge is filled with adventure and excitement. Select your desired unlock lightning sports car along with its superhero, select your desired mode out of day and night modes and begin the 3d race. Drive with extreme caution, collect coins to unlock more missions and sports cars. Breakthrough the blockages and move your super lightning car in zigzag position to avoid crashes. Finish the level in the given time and enjoy more thrilling challenges in hill race. Whether you are a day racer of whether you like driving at night, this game brings you both day and night modes as per your satisfaction level. 

Amazing Features of Hill Climb Racing Legend: Superhero Lightning Car:
	•	Complete range of top speed lightning cars 
	•	Time Mode to check your stunt skills
	•	High quality music and rocking sound
	•	Real and Exotic stunt levels
	•	Realistic and high physics lightning car controls
	•	Narrow and sharp sky high mountain tracks
	•	Best of top racing car games and non wifi games

Excited enough to begin the mountain racing and hike. Just click on the install button and enjoy ultimate climb race. 


Support and Feedback:

Your Feedbacks and ratings are Important for us to keep “GamePixelStudio” busy in creating more fun in the games to engage you, your family and your friends. In case if you find any bug that needed to be addressed just send us an email, we will improve it and reply to your email as soon as possible. Please try our other games by clicking “More from Developer” or by visiting our publisher account.

title: AMG 6x6 Offroad Hill Climb Racing
description:
Take control of 5 Big 6x6 offroad trucks (4x4 with more wheels!) in a huge forest and mountain environment. Accomplish tons of unique missions to be a top offroad driver!

!! AMG 6x6 Offroad Hill Climb Racing contains 20 levels !! 

Get behind the wheel of some serious vehicles in one of the best driving simulators in 6x6 offroad trucks. Get to experience the drive like no other in specially modified trucks, with 6x6 all terrain driving, you can conquer driving offroad in the most realistic way!

Explore the massive open world map, filled with loads points of interest and beautiful vistas in one of the best driving simulators. 
Like a waterfall cascade and a lake, a ancient temple, a small airport, countryside houses and farms, ruins, a camping places, and more... 
Drive on roads that vary from 2x2 lanes, to very small dirt road upmountains, with hill climb.

Join a lifetime adventure with the mountain truck and bring your experience out with heavy duty truck racing. This is the best ever offroad truck driving game and is contained with a variety of crazy offroad stunt missions.

Example of missions :
- Tow broken down 4x4 vehicles offroad
- Transport important cargo across the country
- Follow and train to keep up with police copter with your 6x6 truck
- Race at speed to get through speed traps
- Rescue injured climbers up mountain hill climbs
- Stop and catch all the gangsters with your SUV
- Protect your terrain from wolves
- Avoid without hitting the boars and barrels
- Drive on tricky obstacle courses as fast as possible

Features :
- Huge maps, filled with wide open roads, mountains and forests
- Realistic 6x6 driving simulator
- Realistic offroad driving physics
- High quality 6x6 vehicles
- Dynamic camera angles, control any angle!
- Easy to play driving controls, use touch, wheel and tilt controls!

You can adjust the quality button to play without lag.

title: Motocross Racing
description:
Motocross Racing brings you multiple levels full of tricky obstacles and hair raising stunts.Take your motocrossing bike to the next level in this dynamic physics based motorbike racer game. Perform insane stunts and sonic drifts with multiple camera angles.Take boosters on your way to boost your bombastic ride. Enjoy your motor craft racer in beautiful offroad themes in a fun packed fast bikes race. You can use coins to upgrade your off-road motorcycles to enhance speed, control system, braking system, nitrogen acceleration and more. Take to the road, and offroad, and race the dirt bike over stunt ramp, through tunnels, and over the winter mountains to experience the thrill. 

Get the fastest bike and dominate your friends! Beautiful settings that are HD optimized for an amazing gameplay experience. Choose your motorcycle, strengthen the motorcycle's properties, select the game mode to enter the game; tilt the screen left or right or click the button to control the motorcycle to move left and right, click the accelerator and brake button to control the motorcycle to accelerate or decelerate; after completing the thrilling overtaking, you can obtain certain nitrogen accelerate. If you like to go to extreme speeds and pull off awesome stunt whilst having a fun and exciting time, then you will love to play Motocross Racing!

title: Adrenaline Rush - Miami Night
description:
Adrenaline Rush is a game about racing, escaping, and riding in Miami! 

    Enjoy thousands of top games, no ads, no in app purchases. All exclusive to Vodacom games! subscribers.

Find yourself smack in the middle of a police chase! Get a taste of adrenaline and thrills! It’s all waiting for you when you fire up the game ‘Adrenaline Rush. Miami Nights’. Driving in the wrong direction, crackups and spectacular crashes, dizzying speed ‒ all this against the incredible backdrop of the night city. title: Super Slugs Racing Battle
description:
Super Slugs Racing Battle is a fun and exciting racing game. This game is made especially for kids who love to cart Super Slugs Racing Battle. In Super Slugs Racing Battle  Games, you can choose 10 different car or slugs racer characters to become your ghouls enemy. You can also control the slugs car with simple controls making it easy to play.

Prepare for a race by picking one of the fast sports cars, slugs car or even a more car! Gain enough speed to jump over the ramps or climb to the stiff hill. Your kid will love all the surprises in each level! Let your kids to start the engine and drive these rally cars in the shortest time possible and this will make them happy! Even a toddler can play this game without any problems!

In addition, Slugs comes with 4 different tracks for the race, Collect as many coins as possible to increase the speed of Slugs car and use weapons to defeat the enemy so that slugs becomes the champion at the finish line. If your kids love slugs and cars, then this game is perfect for your child to play.

Super Slugs Racing Battle 2 Features:
• New design!
• Easy controls just tap and tap
• High Graphics Quality!
• 4 different racetracks
• 3 game modes
• A very fun game system
• Fun game play, Cute slugs racer
• You need to collect coins to increase the speed of the car.
• Many different vehicles with unique upgrades (many different vehicles for slugs)

One of the best simple and fun racing games for kids! This free game is made for 2 - 10 years children. Choose your ride and guide it to the finish line! Control your car with just one finger and see how it flips, jumps and rolls on it's way. Other racing games become boring for your kid because of hard levels or controls? This is what you were looking for! Fast, simple and exciting Super Slugs Racing Battle 2!

title: HTR+ Slot Car Simulation
description:
HTR+ is a Slot Car Racing Simulator, a virtual version of the classic toy of the 80´s and 90´s.

HTR+ offers 3 different difficulty levels and 18 tracks that include several challenges like loops, jumps, crossroads, narrows and high speed curves.

You can even build your own tracks with the highly intuitive Track Editor.

Choose from 3 in-game visualization modes, from 3rd-person perspective to in-car camera.

With realistic physics, HTR+ offers an adrenaline packed racing simulation experience.

Tons of cool items to unlock including cars, electric engines, tires, and chassis to optimize your car, there are 443 possible configurations to test on each track.

Race freely on 'Quickrace' mode and practice for the real challenge.

Send your best race times see your time in comparison to the others players around the world. Keep your records updated and prove you are the fastest on all tracks.

Ghost mode: you can race the championship tracks against online player's time.

Share your own created tracks and download tons of amazing ones from community.

title: Lada Drifting 2 VAZ Drift
description:
You can costumize your favourite Lada VAZ and drift on real life tracks and fictional tracks. Some of the tracks are more Open World like, so you can drift to your liking, no road to follow, just drift how you like. You can select from 21 rims, and Painting options are endless. Stance your car out and equip a roll cage, you can really show your style. Add camber or just lower your ride, it's totally up to you, but don't forget, every suspension adjustment affects drivability. Weight reduction, engine tuning, all comes into play while building your ultimate lada drift machine.

Cars:

-Lada VAZ 2105
-Lada VAZ 2104
-Lada Niva VAZ 2121

9 Tracks:

-Drift Masters GP (Drift Arena)
-Debrecen Salak
-Factory (Open World Drift Track)
-City
-Máriapócs (Lada All Star)
-Macau
-Zhuhai
-Shenzen
-Shanshui

Sounds

Sound effects and engine sounds have been recorded from real cars, and both interior and exterior sounds are real sounds.

Physics

The car's handling is realistic but at the time also quite easy to control, but don't forget, modding your lada affects how the car drives and drifts.

Paint

You can paint your car and rims to any color you can think of and set glossines and metalic.

title: 🚗🌎Rally Racer 4x4: Offroad Truck Racing World
description:
Try driving an offroad racing car - 3d extreme rally game is your chance to tap into dirt racing! Experience motor sport as exciting it is with new rally simulator - one of the top mobile rally racing games. Have all fun of rally car games in the 4x4 simulator - drive cool cars, win challenging races, become the champion!

AN EPIC RALLY R.A.C.E. EVENT
Test your driving skills against the most profound rally racers in a series of offroad racing festivals taking place in every corner of America, from California to Alaska. Make your way to the title of a rally racing champion by defeating the current champions. And get ready to face Hector Boswell, legendary rally champion in grand finale!

OFFROAD RACING ACROSS DIVERSE TERRAINS
Any territory of extreme conditions is a good rally racing track. Dirt racing in our rally simulator will take you through the jungles, deserts and frozen wastes with changing weather. Be prepared for anything!

CHALLENGES, STUNTS AND HELICOPTERS
Race with multiple rivals, do crazy stunts and other cool things of rally car games. You can even have a truck race against a helicopter! Do your craziest on the offroad racing track to earn cool rewards and bonuses.

LOTS OF RALLY CARS TO DRIVE AND UPGRADE
Get behind the wheel of 18 of rally racing cars of various classes, from regular SUV to a giant monster-truck, and turn them into real dirt racing monsters using various upgrades and customizable tuning elements. Use new engines, brakes, wheels and lots of other parts to create a unique racing vehilce that suits your driving style!

Try out our new rally racing game - an extreme 4x4 driving simulator and let the R.A.C.E. Begin!

title: Real Taxi Driver 2018
description:
Do you like to transport people? 

Try the new simulation game: Real Taxi driver 2018

Get behind the wheel of taxis and buses and take people where they need to go. The setting is a beautiful big city including off road tracks. Your mission is to pick up passengers and drop them to earn money. Drive in the San Andreas city and experience gorgeous views like never before. Drive at high speeds and don’t let curvy paths and treacherous turns slow you down. 

Real Taxi Driver 2018 is packed with thrilling and exciting pick and drop missions. Pick up passengers from distant locations and take them to their destination on time. Use the GPS based direction maps as your guide to help you reach your destination. Find the best route possible and save precious time! Enjoy easy controls and smooth game play while cruising through the city and off roads.

Real Taxi Driver 2018 features:
•Exciting taxi driving missions and level progression
•Customizable controls (tilt, steer, or buttons) to match your cabs driving style
•Versatile camera featuring various angles for 360 degree visibility
•Marvelous graphics of realistic city environment 
•Smooth controls for challenging gameplay

**Get the #1 Taxi Driver Mobile Game of All Time Today!!**

title: Desert Racing 2018
description:
Start your engine with Desert Racing 2018 and drive through out the impossible tracks! A classic race game with slick controls, smooth driving and intensive structure. Multiple levels will be updated from time to time intervals as soon as you finish. This racer game lets you satisfy the need for speed and find the right balance betweenpowerand grip. In this realistic and engaging drag racer experience,use maximum power and set the engine to provide full power at each gear to boost the car's performance.

With many new modes coming in the next update this game is sure to keep you addicted for many hours! Various types of races to win tournaments, work your way up the rankings or test  nerves. Run TO BURN SOME RUBBER NOW! Explore new racer tracks and keep practicing to master the cutting edge style of Drag Race. You’ll get awesome burnouts and countless upgrades. Improve the performance by winning races, upgrading cars and to get the cutting edge performance.  Keep driving the motorcar to race fast as you can, and maintain distance from other vehicles if you want to win the races and become a champ. Drive safely to avoid bumping into other vehicles. Real-time physics based engine and smooth controlling system. 

Desert Racing 2018 Game Features:-
•	Real racers feel and thrill
•	Immersive deserts theme
•	Easy controllers
•	Realistic sound environment
•	FULL graphics in high sound quality
•	Music and Sound
•       Engaging Gameplay
•       Breathtaking 3D urban environments

How to Play Desert Racing 2018:- 

Tap the phone/tablet on right side to drive / brake.
Tap on left to control steering.

title: Dog Patrol racing team
description:
Paw boys team racing is a fun and exciting racing game. This game is made especially for kids who love to cart Racing paw boys team racing. In paw boys team racing Games you can choose 8 different car or paw boys team racer characters to become your enemy, such as dog, zombie and more. You can also control the paw car with simple controls making it easy to play.

Prepare for a race by picking one of the fast sports cars, paw boys team car or even a more car! Gain enough speed to jump over the ramps or climb to the stiff hill. Your kid will love all the surprises in each level! Let your kids to start the engine and drive these rally cars in the shortest time possible and this will make them happy! Even a toddler can play this game without any problems!

In addition, Paw boys team racing comes with 4 different tracks for the race, Collect as many coins as possible to increase the speed of paw car and use weapons to defeat the enemy so that PAW becomes the champion at the finish line. If your kids love paw boys and cars, then this game is perfect for your child to play.

Paw boys team racing Features:
• New design!
• Easy controls just tap and tap
• High Graphics Quality!
• 4 different racetracks
• 60 different leves
• 3 game modes
• A very fun game system
• Fun game play, Cute puppy racer
• You need to collect coins to increase the speed of the car.
• Many different vehicles with unique upgrades (many different vehicles for Paw boys team racing)

One of the best simple and fun racing games for kids! This free game is made for 2 - 10 years children. Choose your ride and guide it to the finish line! Control your car with just one finger and see how it flips, jumps and rolls on it's way. Other racing games become boring for your kid because of hard levels or controls? This is what you were looking for! Fast, simple and exciting paw boys team racing
