title: City Car Parking 3D
description:
Are you really wanted to learn parking skills? And annoyed by all other parking games just download Car parking 3D and enjoy the realistic graphic and challenges 

 Are you ready for car parking challenges? Only 1% drivers can do this, are you in 1%? Experience your driving skills

Drive through a series of increasingly difficult car parking tasks designed to challenge the best of drivers, all  100% free-to-play!  

REALISTIC 3D GRAPHICS: 
You will be amazed by the high quality 3D realistic view graphics of Car Parking 3D.

REAL CITY ENVIRONMENT: 
Drive through a city and gain parking experience!

DREAM GARAGE: 
 Choose your favorite vehicles from a world’s Top Garage!

VEHICLE CUSTOMIZATION: 
Customize your vehicle, choose your desired colors and decals to equip them!

PARKING SENSOR: 
Park easily between cars with the parking sensor.

REARVIEWS:  
Rearview camera for easy reverse your vehicle easily!

TRAFFIC SIGNS AND REGULATIONS: 
Learn traffic signs and regulations which are very important in this era, at the end of this game you will learn so many things and become a good driver!

 FEATURES OF EXTREME CAR PARKING 3D: 
- Parking Sensor
- Real Car Sound
- In-Camera View
- Detailed Interiors
- Realistic Graphics Quality
- Different Control Methods ( Steering Wheel, Buttons Or Tilting )
- Different Camera Angles
- Learn Traffic Sign and Traffic rules
- Park like a real driver with a steering wheel
- Do hard parking like using a classic car, use steering wheel and do hard parking
- Like Garage owner, you will hard park as a driver spot
- Valet parking is like real parking try it with steering wheel
- Hard parking game with street car
- Multi-languages
- Real cockpit and cars
- Detailed Interiors with valet parking

How to Play: 
- Start the engine.
- Wear the seat-belt.
- Control your car with an on-screen steering wheel or by tilting your mobile.
- Touch the gear button select D for drive, R for reverse and P for park.
- Control the acceleration of car from throttle button dragging up and down.
- Touch the brake button slowdown speed car.

Do give us your Feedback at blackbuckinc@gmail.com So we can improve our application in our next update.
Thank you!

title: Ultimate Car Drive - Classic Car Stunts Simulator
description:
Burn up the streets with the fastest and most visually stunning driving game! Here's the best car driving simulator game of 2018 with the most realistic driving physics, addictive gameplay and endless fun!

It's an exciting car stunts game that offers you the chance to become a real cars racing driver! 

★REAL DRIVING PHYSICS 
Show off your driving skills in Ultimate Car Drive - the ultimate car driving simulator! Take fun driving physics and realism to a whole new level on mobile with the best car driving simulator on Android. 

At its core is an advanced car driving physics engine, that showcases physics of daily driven real cars, racing cars, & also off road SUVs- That's right, each vehicles has their own physics! 

★UNLIMITED GAMEPLAY - The latest driving simulator games!
Create your own real car and show off your style to everyone! Complete various challenging missions to earn game coins and buy new cars with those coins!

★FREESTYLE DRIVING
The huge open world map is designed in a creative way to test your extreme car driving skills on bumps, jumps, loops, up hill sections & mega ramp. 
Ultimate Car Stunts Racing has fast cars, thrilling high speed drifts, exciting stunts, skateboard park, off ramps, twisted loops, climbing elevated areas like hills, mountains, and much more! 

Drift or Drive in real traffic, or simply compete with other drivers in destruction derby and complete missions to enjoy your ride! 

★THE BEST GAMEPLAY
Race, jump and crash your way and other mad rivals through the amazing frontier tracks. Control your motorcar with incredible fast speed as a real driver would! Explore the big city and drive the difficult hill paths! Wreak havoc with high speeds or just smash into other bikes and cars for fun! - You will never dare drive so fast in the real world! 

★THE ULTIMATE VEHICLE DRIVING SIMULATOR
This game showcases extreme cars that do not differ from reality! Jump into your vehicle and performing the craziest tricks in the speediest driving be it on road, tarmac, hill top or dirt games! Slot your car into the right gear and go climbing the hills and pass over the obstacles present in the skareboard park or mountains.

★ULTIMATE CARS
Ultimate Car Drive has many exciting real cars to choose from in its top notch cars games simulation. Racing cars, off road vehicles, SUVs, tuner cars, muscle cars, and last but not the least 4WD trucks that allow you to do hill car driving...Each car is faster and more power packed than the other! 

Drive your vehicle on the endless offroad area with your SUV and experience the most realistic offroad driving experience. Pick your favourite vehicle and burn rubber on the streets with Classic Car Drive Free! 

Start driving your real cars now! Get Car Stunts Racing Free Now!

title: Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games
description:
Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games will set new standard for car driving mobile racing games – you have to play it to believe it. 

Features:

* In Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games you have to control one of 12 Lap Racing Cars for awesome Car Driving experience
* Receive targets in Lap Racing and exceed them to upgrade your cars for best Car driving experience
* Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games contains exciting race model with overtaking and circuits for car driving that suit some teams better than others
* Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games highlights Driver mistakes and show best Car driving experience
* Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games uses no 'Pay to win' game mechanics for car driving

There are no limits in Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games but only your racing skills! So drive as fast as you can, make sharp overtakes, do what you cannot do in real life, and finally race to your limits to become best car racer. Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games features realistic graphics and lots of optimizations on very high detail and realistic graphics for best car racing feel. In Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games Driving physics of all cars in Lap Racing Cars have realistic power, torque and gear ratios. Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games acceleration process and top speeds are based on a complete racing game simulation. Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games Vehicle body weight, gear ratios, engine power and torque ratios are all taken into account for best car racing feel. Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games has very easy and sensitive game controls for you to make great fun out of it. Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games features an ever-expanding roster of tracks with 15 circuits at real-world locations, a 12-car grid and detailed Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games cars allowing you to race anytime, anywhere.

In Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games take the wheel of over 12 intensely detailed vehicles from iconic manufacturers– the most epic Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games experience on any handheld.

Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games features detailed cars, dynamic reflections for lap racing. Enjoy a rich, next-gen game with the competitive lap racers ever. Real Racing 3d : Speed Car lap Racing Games delivers it all and pushes the boundaries with every update.

title: 4x4 Climbing Mountain off the road Vehicles racing
description:
You will have so much fun by climbing the mountains and hills in 4x4 Climbing Mountain off the road Vehicles game. You will start driving your jeep and find your stunt challenge in environment and will act as per given challenge. You’ll drive around the environment and collect gems and coins, which you can use to buy 4X4 hilux , pickup, jeeps and buses. Please be careful about the fuel gauge, if you run short of fuel, find the fuel in map and go to pick up immediately before you jeep turns off and mission fails. You can choose any incomplete stunt challenge from environment and can complete it with skills.

You must collect different cards from the off-road area because it will increase your gems and coins. Don’t forget to pick up your daily bonus within game because it will keep you motivated. 4x4 Climbing Mountain off the road Vehicles racing is a simple realistic 3D hill and desert type off-road driving challenge game. This multi vehicle game will offer you the chance to become a real jeep and bus racing driver and stunt challenge accept or in off road areas. You love climbing mountains and driving through the beautiful off-road paths. This game is complete package for you where you can drive directly within the beautiful courtyard with little mountains around. 

In this 4x4 Climbing Mountain off the road Vehicles racing you will love to drive your real vehicles like police jeep and bus around the hill paths. Be Careful while you drive around the river because you may fall in river if you lose control. You can tow and truck trolly with your jeep as well to complete your transport stunts. So try to go through this amazing hill racing game and you will really enjoy the 4X4 hill climb drive in it..!!

Tips to Play:

- Tap on the car and start your challenge
- Go to long light touching the sky in environment which is stunt and tap start button on dialogue
- Pick up fuel if you run short of gas
- Use nitro to speed up vehicle
- Pick up coins and gems to buy vehicles within environment
- Pick up cards to get more coins and gems
- Tap on map to view the challenges and reward positions
- Tap on repair button to repair your vehicle
- Move around the environment and look up to drive different vehicles like buses, jeeps
- Tap on pause and choose graphics quality from settings
- Get daily bonus and buy vehicles
- Challenge your offroad driving skills

Game Features : 

- 11 different challenging stunts
- 3D Realistic map with proper direction help
- Incredible vehicles like police jeep, beautiful buses
- Wonderful offroad 3D environment with so much rewards around
- Different camera angles
- First person controller
- Realistic fuel bar indicator
- Smooth controls
- It's completely free to play!

So what are you waiting for? Jump into your jeep and try this explore all levels now!

title: Monster Truck Racing Game
description:
Monster Truck Racing Game is a racing game to drive and get realistic experience of monster truck driving. Use your monster truck driving skills and get ready for the thrilling  monster-truck driving missions.  It’s a free racing game. Select your favorite monster truck and smash all the opponents on the racing tracks.

Be a awesome driver in Monster Truck racing Game! Choose huge powerful super crazy monster truck and hit the track by generating turbo boosts and perform stunts to increase your turbo amount. use nitro to speed up your truck in Monster Truck Racing Game but  avoid crashing as you may encounter roads filled with obstacles and traps and get to the finish line as a winner. The game has distinctive 3D environments and incredibly detailed monster trucks where you can customize your ride.

Unlock and upgrade Monster trucks by getting rewards by completing challenges in Monster Truck Racing Game. In this Monster Truck racing game there are 15 tracks. Your goal in this racing challenge is to speed up your Monster truck and win the medal. 
The most amazing fast-paced Monster Truck Racing Game has used real time physics in the monster truck racer game to test your driving skills in the most deadly tracks  racing. Drive your Monster truck to race fast as you can, and keep distance from other vehicles if you want to win the race and become a champ. Drive safely to avoid bumping with other vehicles. Monster truck Racing Game contains real-time physics based engine and smooth controlling system. Tap the accelerator to drive safely to go at the destination of the racing end point in the monster truck racing game. This grand truck driving game offers thrilling and challenging levels to play and become champ. Clear previous level to unlock more difficult levels. This gigantic truck race has most addictive gameplay and features. Feel free to download and enjoy the most realistic off road monster truck driving game.

Monster Truck Racing Game  Game play:
• Select monster-truck and tap on ‘Next’ button.
• Choose the level you want to play on the monster games.
• Touch the accelerometer to race and brake to stop/reverse.
• use Left Side Controls to move right/ left.
• Tap brake to stop and reverse.
• Clear the previous level to unlock more.
• Get cash to upgrade/buy new monster truck

Monster Truck Racing Game Features:
•	Game you have to race with 6 powerful monster trucks!
•	stunning realistic 3D graphics
•	Incredible Sound Effects
•	 Game Real Physics for Truck balance for realistic feel of racing game.
•	Smooth, easy and flexible controls
•	Challenging Gameplay.. After Practive easy to play  racing game for everyone!
•	Free on Google Play! No need of internet connection.

If you like this game, please try our other games as well by clicking “More from Developer” or by visiting our publisher account. And don’t forget to rate and review.

title: Adventure Racing
description:
A completely new take at the old classic game. Play this addictive and super entertaining physics based free racing game! It's an absolute game changer.

Unlock and upgrade awesome cars found only in this uphill racing game. Explore endless adventure maps until your fuel runs out or you flip your head! Drive through beautiful places like Italy, Jungle, and Battlefield. Enjoy the background music specifically made for each level. Customize your player in hundreds of different combinations. Paint your vehicle to your liking!

Earn tickets to unlock special chests that reward coins, gems, and customizations (looks). Chests are a new and a much more interesting way to progress faster in the game. Tickets can be earned at a x2 the rate and chests can be unlocked faster with a VIP subscription that you just have to try out!

Compete in the global leaderboards or against your friends! Climb the racing leaderboards! Prove that you are the #1 adventure racer in your country and the #1 in the whole world! Ranks are distributed across all players that race up hills on their cars. There are the rank leaderboards that have 15 different ranks. And there are the level leaderboards that you can compete for the #1 title with the best score on any particular map.

Features:
• Explore - Unique and beautiful endless adventure maps.
• Compete - Become the #1 player in the world.
• Unlock - Race new & unique vehicles found only in this game.
• Customize - Show off your unique and wicked style.
• Great Graphics - Enjoy super pretty cartoony graphics.
• Realistic Physics - Feel the vehicle as if it's real.

Kill your time by playing a super fun and challenging game that increases your skills and moves you up the world leaderboards to prove your indisputable level of skill!

title: Disc Drivin' 2
description:
Faceoff with friends in a turn-based, disc-swiping race as you compete to be the first to get your disc around the track. Tackle tracks with sweeping curves and elevation changes in physics-based environments. Play at your own pace as you master the action-packed sport of disc drivin’.

Based on the acclaimed original Disc Drivin’, Disc Drivin’ 2 is a combination of skill and tension-producing physics. Now with two swipes per turn, set up your shot and make a second move while still in motion to avoid an unexpected hazard at the last second. Armed with an arsenal of upgradable powers to slip past your enemy, decide the best way to outrace your opponent. Try your hand at the new Speedrun mode where you’ll race against the clock to improve your skills. Earn coins in competition to unlock cards, new powers, discs, and abilities.

A competitive battle to the finish line, Disc Drivin’ 2 is a fresh combination of friendly competition, anticipation, strategy, and hijinks on the track! 

Features:
• Intuitively swipe to move your disc around the track
• Compete in turn-based multiplayer battles around the globe
• More than 15 unique tracks of various challenge levels
• Single-player Speedrun and pass-and-play modes
• Collect cards to unlock crazy new discs, upgrade powers, and earn disc abilities
• Many unique powers such as turbo, missiles, autopilot, and bombs
• New animated hazards like lasers, spikes, and force fields
• Customize your disc and play as a pizza, cake, monster truck tire, and more
• Full 3D physics
• Four cheerful and immersive environments

description:
Paw Puppy Racing Team is a fun and exciting racing game. This game is made especially for kids who love to cart Paw Puppy Racing Team Car games. In Paw Puppy Racing Team Car Games you can choose 10 different car or paw patrol racer characters to become your enemy, such as dog, zombie and more. You can also control the paw car with simple controls making it easy to play.

Prepare for a race by picking one of the fast sports cars, paw puppy car or even a more car! Gain enough speed to jump over the ramps or climb to the stiff hill. Your kid will love all the surprises in each level! Let your kids to start the engine and drive these rally cars in the shortest time possible and this will make them happy! Even a toddler can play this game without any problems!

In addition, Paw Puppy Racing Team Car comes with 4 different tracks for the race, Collect as many coins as possible to increase the speed of paw car and use weapons to defeat the enemy so that PAW becomes the champion at the finish line. If your kids love paw and cars, then this game is perfect for your child to play.

Paw Puppy Racing Team Car Features:
• New design!
• Easy controls just tap and tap
• High Graphics Quality!
• 4 different racetracks
• 3 game modes
• A very fun game system
• Fun game play, Cute puppy racer
• You need to collect coins to increase the speed of the car.
• Many different vehicles with unique upgrades (many different vehicles for Paw puppy)

One of the best simple and fun racing games for kids! This free game is made for 2 - 10 years children. Choose your ride and guide it to the finish line! Control your car with just one finger and see how it flips, jumps and rolls on it's way. Other racing games become boring for your kid because of hard levels or controls? This is what you were looking for! Fast, simple and exciting paw puppy car racing!

title: Wingsuit Simulator - Sky Flying Game
description:
Welcome to Wingsuit Paragliding Skydiving Adventure, where the thrill of skydiving and paragliding begins with your wings of success in this gliders race. Wingsuit simulator 3d game with First Free mode having a collection of fascinating rings at different views challenging you to ring jumps these rings safely on flying crossy roads. Distance covering mission begins in which you as a skydiver have to complete the maximum distance by keeping your wingsuit wings on fire. In addition to modes now participate in a competitive situation or fight to decide who is superior where enemies attack you and you have to survive and control the situation with your wingsuit action and your counter attack can destroy the enemy basis with a unique concept of this super hero powers wingsuit man from one of th best wingsuit games. Avoid interaction with any object around you when you are flying or jumping otherwise, it will cause serious injury and damage making you a faily rider of wingsuit flying simulator. 

Fly like a bird in the mountains rocks and forest environment, jump from a highest peak cliff or mountain and make your dream come true of skydive through the sky and paraglide with all your power wearing wingsuit costume and become a unique paraglider in the most fascinating wingsuit games from a flying shooting games. Dodge obstacles in the mountains for survival and reaching to the destination for an flying adventure paragliding games experience. Simply go mountains for one of the many secrets scattered across the map as you spread your wings towards victory. Go smooth and pass through the rings by wings avoiding hurdles and obstacles in the free mode as long as possible for maximum achievements hidden in the mountain range and rocky areas for a dangerous shooting adventure in wingsuit games. 

This 3D simulation game teach you the foremost techniques for flying in the sky as paraglider and skydive with a different concept of skydiving games! In addition Distance mode with unique and challenging concept of flying shooter games. Aim with a force of attentive action in this distance mode as you are the best paraglider and here you have to fly and explore for a maximum distancein natuve beauty adventure for unlocking further unique and supreme levels of distance mode in this paraglider game. In attack mode, enemies attack you from base camps with missiles and fires you have to survive through the situation and fly like an eagle in paraglider game kill the enemies with your paragliding techniques and experience of fun flying under different difficult and exciting flying conditions.

Features:
-Wingsuit Costumes Collection
-Fun gameplay Levels
-Huge open environments to explore
-Survival mode with multiple challenges
-High-quality Sound and Graphics

title: Flag Car Stunt Master Free Superhero Game
description:
Welcome to the world of real impossible racing tracks flag car racing games along with your favorite  super speed heroes . A classic thrills providing and rush games with slick controls, smooth driving, amazing car race and race competition. It is time for exciting stunt riding, ramp stunts, stunt drive, speed stunts and drifting while driving in country flags speed cars on stunt car track in this fun racing 2018 games and best racing games. Racing has never been so fun and flag car and driving simulator was never that exciting to join racing club and enjoy racing tips. Get ready to drive amazing super sports car through dangerous and crazy path in this car games for free.

A crazy racing game and  crazy car driving is in front of you. Enjoy the thrill of your car ride through tricky paths in this extreme car simulator. Be the best stuntman of some of the fastest flag cars on the race tracks in this latest car games with country exciting flags. Use the games fine controls to successfully complete the impossible racing without crashing and falling off the track. 

There are several super hero cars available in this superhero blast and car stunt games to perform the incredible speed stunts on the ramps among your favorite superhero characters. Get ready to drive high performance speed cars and upgrade them to keep the best performance.

In this engaging drifting 2018 game, use maximum power at each gear to boost the cars racing and driving performance and enjoy being in stunt zone. You will need all your racing skills and concentration to jump over gaps and pass all the obstacles as fast as possible without crashing your speed car. Be perfect while taking the sharp and narrow turns and rush like a pro stunt and racing master. This car stunt game allows you to boost your flag car racing and car parking skills by providing you the most realistic simulation view. Colorful and stunning, cylinders, footballs, fences, traffic cones barriers, beautiful flags and other colourful props are placed in the environment to give this game exciting look and feel. 

Gameplay of this super fast car racing game is easy and fun. Choose your super hero and super sports cars with flags. Get in your ultra fast car, drive through racing arena, go through the check points , perform crazy racing and speed stunts and achieve the targeted score by hitting footballs and reach the finish point in the given time to complete the level and unlock further levels and exciting top speed racing sports cars. Use the different camera views to avoid the crashes and fall downs and race to the top of racing tracks. Drive your car at your full speed and you will complete the missions on time. To complete the levels you need to avoid obstacles and become the stunt master.

With many new levels coming in the next update of this car racing game this is surely going to keep you busy for hours. 

Response to your speed racing needs and install this stunting and crazy car driving & racing game! 


Features of Flag Car Stunt Master Free Superhero Game: 

	•	Amazing sports & stunt cars with flags & realistic driving models
	•	Multiple levels & missions to satisfy your racing needs
	•	Separate car parking for cars selection
	•	Cool 3D graphics and smooth physics simulation
	•	Amazing and effective visual and sound effects
	•	Different panoramic camera views to make simulation driving easy.
	•	Narrow ramps and extreme hurdles to cross.
	•	Unique race tracks & cliffside roads to test all types of fast driving
	•	Best of top free games and a non wifi game


Support and Feedback:

Your Feedbacks and ratings are Important for us to keep “Game Pixels Studio” busy in creating more fun in the games to engage you, your family and your friends. In case if you find any bug that needed to be addressed just send us an email, we will improve it.

title: motoNduro
description:
motoNduro is a motocross simulation / game and offers entertainment without any limitations. Race against time and have fun!

 motoNduro - moto and enduro game gives you the chance to prove how fast you are! As you ride motors, your skills will evolve and you will be amazed how skillful a driver you become. Have fun while you are conquering the extreme terrains.

In this motorcycle racing game, top-level graphics and very realistic physics came to life. Prepare for the fun, let the adrenaline fill you! While exhibiting your skills, you will enjoy many moto bike ride.

11 Motorbikes
You will love 11 motocross bikes specially selected.Try them in our rough terrains.

8 Riders
You could be one of those special drivers.

Graphics
motoNduro has 8 specially designed levels. Ambiance will spoil you:  Forest, desert, twilight, rain, storm and more... Prepare to be dirty and have fun! Do not forget to enjoy the top-class 3D graphics while racing against time!

Main features:

Free to ride, sky is the limit!

Optimized high-resolution graphics will blow your mind.

16 Language support.

FPS camera is our favor. Do not forget to try other cams to see how your skills are in action. 

Button, joystick or tilt. Also supports Bluetooth game pads.
 
Please don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.

Let the enduro begins, have Fun!

title: Hot Road Racers - Happy Riders Wheels Max Drift
description:
Hot Road Racers - Happy Riders Wheels Max Drift Game to be  Drift Legends  and Enjoy Happy Rider Wheels Race.
Hot Road Racers - Happy Riders Wheels Max Drift  is one of the best Multiple Rider racing games. Have fun dodging cars and Bikes , Bicycles and Quad Bikes while you speed up to the limit, Max Drift . Race against the AI in an outstanding Racing Face-Off and try to earn the respect of your fellow racers.
The ultimate drift racing experience in the most realistic drifting game around. Drive legendary drift cars on different tracks, beat records, take part in different drift racing events, rise from Beginner to Professional League driver.
Hot Road Racers - Happy Riders Wheels Max Drift  is all about driving fast in a real world with speedy  Vehicles. Supercharged car racing motion simulator for car racing lovers to burn the tire rubber on Hot Roads and race to become Drift Legends. 
Hot Road Racers - Happy Riders Wheels Max Drift is not a easy traffic to overtake so be careful while driving because hit and run is not the option in this game, once you hit someone your mission in this game is failed. Drive most realistic speeding cars in Hot Road Racers - Happy Riders Wheels Max Drift game.
Hot Road Racers - Happy Riders Wheels Max Drift is Hot Roads Racer Game. Try to be one of the fastest Hot Roads racer in the global leaderboards. Game takes you on a long beautiful Speedway where you can drive as much as you can .
Hot Road Racers - Happy Riders Wheels Max Drift is the most thrilling, super charged action pace  Simulation Game for car racing lovers to burn rubber and race for king of speed on android devices! This Multiple RIDER  simulation is the ultimate drag race on asphalt streets, featuring numerous world class sports cars , Bikes , Bicycles and Quad Bikes, tons of missions to complete, stunning optimized graphics, immersing gameplay, intense Nitro booster and realistic traffic condition!

Hot Road Racers - Happy Riders Wheels Max Drift is a true-to-life racing game, which you can experience real high-speed driving and furiously collision while driving a bunch of luxury cars to battle top racers. If you are a big fan of arcade racing fan, you won’t miss the exciting and challenging Hot Road Racers - Happy Riders Wheels Max Drift 


Hot Road Racers - Happy Riders Wheels Max Drift Features:

🏎 Real physics
🏎  detailed environments 
🏎 Car racing  on very especially multiple designed speedway tracks
🏎  Moto Racing on very especially multiple designed speedway tracks
🏎 Bicycle and Quad Bikes Racing
🏎 Smooth and realistic Drifts
🏎 Very insane and crazy feeling of very powerful and speedy sports Vehicles
🏎 Stunning HD graphics, stunning 3D graphics
🏎 Nitro Booster for super-speed road racing advanced shield to protect
🏎 Awesome Expensive vehicles to choose from
🏎 Rich types of NPC traffic including trucks, buses and SUVs.
🏎 The game will challenge even the most skilled racing fans
🏎 The completely new way of Hot Road Racers Challenges.
🏎 Exclusive Customization
🏎 Awesome music.

Never drive at fast speed in real world? Now it’s your chance to feel the passion and real Drift in your hands with Hot Road Racers - Happy Riders Wheels Max Drift
Get ready to drive high performance at high speed in specially designed tracks for car racing? Now grip the wheels and push your ride to it’s limit, put your foot to the floor and drive!
 What are you waiting for? Download now! and Have some Drift Racing fun.

title: Moto Trial Racing
description:
Try our exclusive 3D bike driving game online and experience the thrill and the adventure in this epic fun Moto Trial Racing game.

Race your bike or atv through the toughest forests tracks. And drive downhill while you jump over ramps and cliffs. Use arrow keys to accelerate and balance the bikes through ten awesome challenging levels. While you jump over obstacles, ramps the biker will try to make some random tricks like: air flow, super man, joy, back and front flips. To help you on your difficulty roads nitro is added to your bikes when activated it will boost your speed and make you stay in the air longer.

There are five different bikes and five powerful atv, unlock them all and drive to see how each one handle. The game also can be played solo or vs AI. Make sure you always use your nitro and try to overcome the other players and win first place. Have fun!

Features
- Awesome 3D low poly graphics.
- You can play the game in single player or vs AI.
- 5 bikes and 5 atv all different in weight, speeds and power.
- 10 intense and beautiful looking mountain levels.
- Easy and fun to play.

title: Avenging Cars Battle Royale
description:
The Battle of the King! Become the number one in the world's list of the most furious and insane drivers who saddled monsters on wheels!

- Beautiful and realistic HD graphics
- A unique battle system
- Convenient machine control and interface interaction
- Realistic and detailed damage and destruction system
-Stunning locations, starting with arenas of burning desert, destroyed plants and finishing with arctic apocalypse and nuclear submarines. Each of the locations is fraught with its secrets and dangers.
- Debugged optimization even for old Chinese phones
- Realistic machines, again rebelling from the world of a landfill in the apocalyptic world
- Advanced system of machine improvements, a huge number of combinations and customization for your character
- Smart AI opponents who can find a way out of any situation and not let you get bored
- Bosses on steep wheelbarrows
- A variety of weapons, ranging from machine guns, ending with rocket launchers and mortars

The model of damages of in-game cars deserves attention - depending on the strength and the place of the impact on the models, dents are formed, the glass breaks, parts of the body components fall off, when the running gear on the wheels is damaged, "eight" are formed up to the loss of the wheels, the final result of the car's destruction is ignition of the engine compartment. Destruction of enemy vehicles or causing as much damage as possible is the main goal, however, in the mode of racing competition, the opportunity to destroy an opponent's car is missing.
The overall style of survival races pushes the player to various tricks and tricks during the competition for the leading position, such as, for example, the ram of a rival machine, in order to squeeze his car or push him into a hard or heavy obstacle, which can lead to the failure of his car , attempts to shove his car off the track, use the features of the track for the device traps - travel near the trailer, laden with a round forest, entailing the breaking of the logs on the track.

Drive, chaos and destruction are the fundamental factors for a real derby!

P.S.: Thank you, dear users, for your comments and propositions. That’s very important for us! We’re doing our best to give you pleasure and enjoyment.

VK - https://goo.gl/6C89N6
Instagram - https://goo.gl/T9XE8D

title: Drifting Bike

Experience the thrill of motorbike drift in our latest motorsport racing game! Drifting Bike  game will test your skill to the limit. How far can you perform drifting donuts and burnouts  with your motorcycle? Can you impress everyone as you rampage through the parking area, facility tracks? Play our motorsport game and find out!
HOW TO PLAY: Tilt your phone to steer your motorcycle to left or right. Meanwhile, you can perform drift, donuts and burnouts with the buttons. For example, you can use your thumb to tap brake and press throttle button to activate drifting mode. 
========================================================
FEATURES OF Drifting Bike - Free race simulator
========================================================
Realistic and immersive game graphic & sound. 
Get coins to unlock more bikes and parts. 
Try your hand at riding low cc scooters and turbo bikes
Upgrade your motorcycles and customize them 
play from off road to city road.

TYPES OF CHALLENGE:
Time Challenge.
Drifting Challenge
4 different graphics setttings ( LOW MEDIUM HIGH ULTRA)
Our Motorsport game is very addictive and realistic. If you want to experience extreme motorcycle racing game, this is the game that you should try. If you are a gamer who doesn’t back down from a challenge, then this game is perfect for you! download our moto drift racing game now!

HOW TO PLAY: Tilt your phone to steer your motorcycle to left or right. Meanwhile, you can perform drift, donuts and burnouts with the buttons. For example, you can use your thumb to tap brake and press throttle button to activate drifting mode.
========================================================
FEATURES OF Drifting Bike - Free race simulator
========================================================
Realistic and immersive game graphic & sound.
Get coins to unlock more bikes and parts.
Try your hand at riding low cc scooters and turbo bikes
Upgrade your motorcycles and customize them
play from off road to city road.
Perform awesome motorcycle stunts on your bikes.
Intuitive and response game control.

TYPES OF CHALLENGE:
Time Challenge.
Drifting Challenge
4 different graphics setttings ( LOW MEDIUM HIGH ULTRA)
Our Motorsport game is very addictive and realistic. If you want to experience extreme motorcycle racing game, this is the game that you should try. Riding a motorbike is definitely more challenging than even the most extreme car driving simulator. That’s because you have to control everything at once: your direction, the speed, and how you throttle. To succeed as drift racer, you must give your 100% attention.
If you are a gamer who doesn’t back down from a challenge, then this game is perfect for you! download our moto drift racing game now!
---
Please help us improve our games! Leave us your rating and review.
summary:
Realistic Motorbike drifting game.
Race, Drift, Stunt and earn coins!

description:
Are you ready to show some crazy stunts as a rooftop rider in this new bike game3d? perform perfectly in this wheels game and jump through one building to another. This is the real insane motorcycle game in which rider will show some extreme riding skills after accepting the sky-high riding missions challenges. So are you ready to become a full 3d racer showing some shadow stunts in the vast city roads? Jump high superbike through the city buildings and win the breathtaking traffic less show. Use the Nos to complete the tricky race. 
In this bike stunt game jump high in the air without touching the ground and show some daring racer stunts. So put your safety gears and complete the riders challenge. One thing, its really a fast speed tricky game so be careful. Fly off from one point to another just follow the game rules and win the race. Each level is more challenging and thrilling than the previous one. So in this action-packed fun game, you are free to show your 3d motorcycle skills. title: Extreme Crazy Car
description:
ٍ* Extreme crazy car is a Car Simulation game show your skills in car driving and controlling the car , it’s ِِa first class simulation game , the physics and movement of the car make you feel like you are driving a real car , through this game you can drive four cars of different types and colors , Each car has certain advantages in terms of weight, speed, performance, strength and so on, You have to turn on the car by pressing the key icon so you can move the car , you can use the front lights of the car , You can see the car from four different angles by clicking on the camera icon in the game screen  , All cars are available for free and without having to score points in the game, you choose the car you wish , at the beginning of the game you have to press the power button until the engine turns , then the car starts to move when you press the Fuel Pedal in the normal controlling or tilt controlling ,And pull the Joystick up if you choose to control by  Joystick .

* You will choose the type of stage you wish to play, and each type has a special thrill and excitement :

- Arrival Challenge  .
- Short Racing .
- Free Drifting .

- After choosing the type of game you choose the type of control that can be easy for you to drive and control easily , in this game are three types of controlling :

- The first type is driving by regular control which is the easiest and simplest but it may not be real enough. This type contains arrows for right and Left movement , It has a fuel Pedal and a brake pedal. You should hold down the accelerator pedal to increase speed, Keep a good speed ,  and press the brake pedal if you want to stop the car.

- The second type is driving by tilting. This type is closer to the truth and makes you feel as if you are driving a Real car. With tilt control, you can change the direction of the car to the right and the Left by tilting the mobile during play, and also has a  Fuel pedal and a Brake pedal to stop the car.

- The Third  type is driving By Joystick , pull the Joystick up / Down if you Want to move forward / Backward and right/Left to move to Your Direction .


* The game is divided into three types *

- Arrival Challenge : It enables you to reach a certain point at the end of the street . During a specified time at the top of the game screen, You Will Drive Your Car On An Asphalt Road Or Through Mountains heights in turns, and slopes , you must cross the obstacles of the cement blocks and barrels without hitting it . May hit your car and lead to smashing it, make sure your car does not hit these obstacles 3 times , or you will lose.


- Short Racing : It is a race with a number of cars for a distance of not more than 5 kilometers, you have to reach the finish racing point before any of the cars competing and compete for you to win the race, and be careful not to let any of the competing cars collide with you , or you will lose.

- Free Drifting : It is a crazy sport famous in the Middle East and Gulf regions called Hjulh or Tvhit or Drifting or burning the street, and it requires high skill in driving cars, beware of collisions with other cars so as not to lose, this stage only for entertainment and has no end If you do not collide with other cars and fail.

- Be sure to pick up fuel gallons so you do not lose because of the loss of fuel.
- You can get off the car and walk through someone, and you will be able to ride other cars

* Game features *

- Divided into several sections each section of it excitement and adventure of a special 
  kind .
- Three different ways to control the car according to your desire and your ability .
- There are four of the most famous types of cars.
- Speedometer .
- Fuel meter .
- Multiple cameras show the car from different angles .

title: Police Gangsters Car Chase: Vegas City Mafia Crime
description:
Let’s fasten your seat belt & prove yourself as daring police officer to control crime and chase down criminals. Be the perfect cop car driver to chase robbers & criminals. Police gangster’s car chase & Vegas city mafia crime game has endless action to arrest city criminals, bank robbers and Alcatraz jail prisoners in modern us Vegas city. Robbers are getting away with crime so fulfill your duty as an expert police driver to chase criminals. Arrest all Alcatraz jail escaped prisoners and now involved in criminal activities in car simulator. In Vegas city mafia crime games bank robbers are trying to get away from city crime scene. Criminals are driving fast but you as police officer in gangster’s car chase game & your duty is to chase & arrest them before safe escape. Police gangster’s car chase & Vegas city mafia crime 3d game allows you to experience the most epic chase on the road. 


Now it's up to you, how secretly chase criminal vehicles and quickly capture them back to jail lockup custody in police gangsters car chase games in us Vegas city car driving and car chase games. Don’t crash with citizen’s car. It’s your duty to protect the city properties and arrest criminals. Extreme car driving, racing, drifting and chasing with police car in this cop chase & arrest simulator. The real challenging gameplay missions will make you drive with extreme speed on a pursuit against criminals. The criminals are on the run and you need to chase & arrest them down. The drugs mafia, land mafia and the terrorists are out there on the public places, disturbing the peace of the city. Exciting follow begin when a police car drivers sees a thief car running on city highway in this police gangsters car chase & Vegas city mafia crime game. Your duty is to bring the peace back and crack down and enforce the law. 


While you are busy in this police pursuit you should also make quick decision to take shortcuts while keeping short time in your mind. If police chases the wrong car in this police gangsters car chase & Vegas city mafia crime game then you will fail the level and begin all over again catching police escape cars. Take down runaway street racers while avoiding civilian cars as you chase and weave through traffic. Outrun high speed felons, outsmart rivals, outdrive buddy police and smash road in the most dangerous racing game now. Let the police chase thief and their cars you focus on your driving and the short time laps and make cops chasers win. While police chase the thief car you will keep the track to pursue more crime cars in this police gangsters car chase & Vegas city mafia crime gameplay. This police car driving simulator game is basically surfacing up in police chase games 2018 which are addictive to play and challenging to master.


 Police Gangsters Car Chase: Vegas City Mafia Crime Gameplay Features: 


•	Amazing experience of police car driving & arresting criminals
•	Police car drive, drift & chasing of thieves, robbers & gangsters
•	Explore us Vegas city with your police car driving duty
•	Vegas crime city scenes with full adventurer missions
•	Chasing criminals and smashing of gangster cars on road
•	Realistic us police car driving simulator game
•	Extreme police car pursuit and criminal car chase
•	Realistic car driving controls and addictive action gameplay

title: Angry Cops : Car Chase Game
description:
Escape if you can ! 

While you escape the cops will try to smash your car. Imagine that you are escaping from cops and the angry cops is on your tail. Jump into your car and try to shake off the pursuit! Avoid from cop cars in high speed chase game and save yourself from angry cops!  Do you want to give a try to extreme drift car driving game? All you need is to put your thumb on the wheel. So simple is that : drift the car and escape from the cop cars and become a drift legend. While avoiding the cops be careful and watch out the obstacles. Collect as much as money before you cops crash and smash your car. 
Don`t wait more to reach high speed drifts and get awesome cars. Cop cars, vans and trucks are chasing you, they will pop up from every corner! Be prepared to avoid and survive as much as you can! Every time cops will come in large numbers, all they want to catch you. Cops are very fast n furious, but it is not about racing, it’s about drifting. Test your skills, drift around and find out if you can be faster than them. Let the drifty chase begin!
Avoid police cars and don’t get busted. Be careful do not crash! If you find a wrench collect it to repair your car. Collet money to unlock new cars from shop. There are various cars which has high endurance and speed. Mind the obstacles and rocks. Angry cops is an addictive car chase game. Police cars will drive you crazy. But don`t worry there is no roads limiting you, everywhere you drive is off-road.
Let's play this awesome car chase game!

Instructions for playing :
Angry Cops : Robbers Car Chase game is awesome car chase game. Travel around by either using the joystick or tap controls. All you need to do is to escape from cops. 
Cop cars will follow you. Use your drifting skills to avoid them. Pass between police cars, and make them crash each other that they will smash. 
Drift around and collect money to increase your score. With money collected unlock faster, better drifting and more durable cars. But keep in mind there are also various types of police cars chasing you!
Download this car drifting game and start to escape from police cars! Let you be the king of drift and become a legend!
Key features:
Free game.
Super simple car drift game.
East to grasp controls.
One touch fast restart.
Lots of cars to unlock.
More cars coming on every update.
Awesome 3D graphics.
Game by Deedy Duck Games.
Follow Deedy Duck Games on twitter and Facebook for updates.

title: Monster Truck Demolition Fury: Destruction Derby
description:
Let the madness begin! Push the throttle of giant truck and set out for massive destruction. Get ready for extreme demolition derby in latest Monster Truck Demolition Fury: Destruction Derby and play all new car stunt game. Race giant wheels through other cars, crashing and smashing them to be the destruction champion. Be the last one to survive in this monster wheeler truck arena performing impossible challenge stunt car demolition in this thrill filled extreme driving. Show off yourself as crazy car rider.

Monster Truck Demolition Fury: Destruction Derby is real car crash game indulging in extreme thrilling adventure full of danger and risk. Race your truck’s giant wheels in raging monster derby arena and surpass the deadly escape. Crash cars with extreme driving in bumper car stunt racing leading to death race. Strive hard for deadly escape. Enemy cars and trucks are powerful and hard to compete against them. However, lose no hope, race your truck through the arena derby and be the champion of car crash demolition. Get prepared for the ultimate whirlpool derby and race through car war.

Buckle up now, race your car and set out for road rampage. Monster Truck Demolition Fury: Destruction Derby has never been so adventurous and exciting. Play now your favourite destruction car derby game. Combat now your racing skills and hit hard enemy cars to crash and smash it into pieces. Speed through cars and knockout cars in monster racing war derby. Hit and smack cars down for realistic car crash and destruction.  Escape and dodge furious cars that are at its rage; and bump them to win this monster cars destruction championship. Be reckless and furious, become the racing legend of monster car war. 

Get set for xtreme car wreck in this death race and and speed your way through crashing all the cars on your way. Be the deadly sportsman and face any sort of impossible challenge in this car stunt death race war. Tighten up the seat belts and hold on tight the steering wheel for ultimate sunt action game where each exiting mission takes you to whole new car crash experience. You need courage to survive as the last one standing and bring out the fearless monster car driving skills. 

Gear up yourself for the latest Monster Truck Demolition Fury: Destruction Derby. Play this car crash arena war now and destruct furious monster cars in this adventurous and exciting demolition derby game.

title: Extreme City GT Free Car Stunts : Ultimate Driving
description:
Extreme City GT Free Car Stunts : Ultimate Driving

Are you brave enough to take the Extreme toproof GT Car Stunts challenge and skilled enough to master it? Let's see if you can survive the most stimulating stunt arena! 

Who doesn't love the thrill that comes with performing serious hyper stunts? Are YOU ready? Drive and maneuver through treacherous rocky toproof hills to dominate the levels!.Do you consider yourself a professional specialist rooftop driver of dashy crashy? Do you think you are capable of mastering driving and simulation skills? Show him in this crazy adventure.

In this car stunt game your duty is to accept impossible difficult hyper stunt challenges and take a ride on zigzag tracks. We will provide you realistic game play environment with stunt tracks. We provide you multiple levels; every level becomes more attractive and scary for driving.

If you are a fast speed run ninja racer and have a passion for car racing games then be ready to experience the real car rally in the mid of sky with no limits. Rush like a crazy rider stunt master while riding the beautifully designed real impossible tracks and beat the rival racers in this breathtaking adventure. The real impossible track race allows you to boost your car racing and car parking skills by providing you the most realistic simulation view. Jump and ride on the mid-air amazing tracks and feel like a champion’s racer. Use the nitro boost to cross the difficult hurdles and obstacles in this car stunt games 2018.

The real impossible track race allows you to boost your car  racing and car parking skills by providing you the most realistic simulation rider view. Jump and ride on the mid-air amazing tracks and feel like a champion’s racer. Use the nitro boost to cross the difficult hurdles and obstacles in this car stunt games 2018.The wild and crazy fantasy hyper stunts city of refuge will blow your mind! Modern stunt environment, awesome car smashing machines and mechanized techno based obstacles. Perform high jumps on colossal ramps; accelerate through fiery hoops; jimmy through deadly propellers; knock down and smash all types of obstacles. In this arcade game you race between blazing fires, accelerate your way through terrifying loops and crazy jumps. Drive at your full speed and you will complete the missions on time. Maneuver with the skills of a pro stunt dashy crashy driver!

Stay on the slopes without falling, perform extreme  rooftop hyper stunts and high jumps on colossal ramps, avoid all obstacles in the city of refuge. Drive at full speed to carry out missions on time. Avoid crashes and falls from the top of the dashy crashy race tracks. Be careful while driving the car on impossible tracks and show your good driving skills. Dangerous stunt game is hard to drive on zigzag track ramps in sky road. In this big ramp game, you must have a impossible track car rider racing skills. You have to complete each impossible race mission in order to unlock the next one. Use the different camera views to avoid the crashes and fall downs from the top of the racing tracks. Be perfect while taking the sharp and narrow turns and rush like a pro stunt master. Tap the nitro button to boost your stunt car whenever you feel your speed slow. 


Extreme City GT Free Car Stunts : Ultimate Driving Features:

♠ Variety of Playable Sports Cars
♠ Marvellous 3D game graphics and realistic views.
♠ Amazing Environments
♠ HD graphics and background sound
♠ Multiple thrilling levels
♠ Mid-air hyper stunts and sky high driving tracks
♠ Extremely Precise Driving Simulator
♠ Immersive and addicting driving ,sharp narrow turns.
♠ Realistic Driving Experience

title: Extreme Formula One Racing Rivals
description:
Extreme Formula One Racing Rivals

Do you want to be the champion of formula one racing game? Play this top speed Extreme Formula One Racing Rivals game for free which is too close to the real formula one racing. Extreme Formula One Racing Rivals is a Realistic racing game but at the same time compelling physics, realistic and smooth vehicle controls and tracks with the feeling of the tracks of the real F1 championship. You may have played many Extreme formula one car racing 3d games free 2018 but here you got a chance of becoming champion of extreme Top Speed Formula Racing in almost all GP environments, on all GP tracks. You will forget all another formula one Car Top Speed Games after playing this Extreme Formula One Racing Rivals ultimate 2018 game. Show off your formula one racing speed car driving skills in ultimate Formula one Car racing games and be the best extreme car racer that everyone envies. 
The ultimate goal of super extreme formula one road car racing game is to beat the enemies, top the Race, unlock the next race and get included in our formula racing Hall of Fame to become the living legend of super Furious Formula High-Speed Formula Racing Car game. In speed crush Furious Formula Racing car game 2018 there are three modes. First one is practice mode in which you can practice for the racing. The second one is championship mode, in this mode, you can play 21 championship matches and you will compete with the number of opponents if you win the race the next championship match will be unlocked. A third one is a knockout mode, in this mode, there is a checkpoint on the track, you have to cross it before the opponents. If you succeeded you will survive else you will lose the race. Super Ultimate formula one car racing drifting game which spectators love to enjoy top speed champions ultimate driving games 3d, sports car racing games, extreme sports car driving 2018, heavy traffic elite mode traffic racing championship extreme nitro ultimate fun tournament Top Speed Formula Car Racing Games Extreme Car Stunt Racing F1 games for kids 2018. 
Formula one racing car games 3d are not the same anymore, top free formula one racing car game 3d 2018 evolve the number of achievements that will be awarded after every championship match and a leaderboard in which you will see your rank and will compare yourself with the other users. You can grab the top position on the leaderboard by playing as many matches as you can.  The amazing Formula Racing car challenge for real racers creed have different tracks i.e. US Grand Prix circuit, Italia Grand Prix circuit, Francia Grand Prix circuit, Alemania Grand Prix circuit, España Grand Prix circuit, UK Grand Prix circuit, Colombia Grand Prix circuit, Republica Checa Grand Prix circuit, Suiza Grand Prix circuit, Brazil Grand Prix circuit 
Features: 
1-	Three game modes: practice, championship and knockout.
